text: For he that is called in the Lord , being a servant , is the Lord ' s freeman : likewise also he that is called , being free , is Christ ' s servant .

text: Now concerning virgins I have no commandment of the Lord : yet I give my judgment , as one that hath obtained mercy of the Lord to be faithful .

text: I suppose therefore that this is good for the present distress , I say , that it is good for a man so to be .

text: Art thou bound unto a wife ? seek not to be loosed . Art thou loosed from a wife ? seek not a wife .

text: But and if thou marry , thou hast not sinned ; and if a virgin marry , she hath not sinned . Nevertheless such shall have trouble in the flesh : but I spare you .

text: But take heed lest by any means this liberty of yours become a stumblingblock to them that are weak .
text2: wairþai þaim unmahteigam

text: For if any man see thee which hast knowledge sit at meat in the idol ' s temple , shall not the conscience of him which is weak be emboldened to eat those things which are offered to idols ;

text: But when ye sin so against the brethren , and wound their weak conscience , ye sin against Christ .

text: Have we not power to eat and to drink ?

text: I therefore so run , not as uncertainly ; so fight I , not as one that beateth the air :

text: Moreover , brethren , I would not that ye should be ignorant , how that all our fathers were under the cloud , and all passed through the sea ;

column6: Moreover , brethren , I would not that ye should be ignorant , how that all our fathers were under the cloud , and all passed through the sea ;

text: Moreover , brethren , I would not that ye should be ignorant , how that all our fathers were under the cloud , and all passed through the sea ;
text2: Ni wiljau izwis unwitans broþrjus þatei attans unsarai allai uf milhmin wesun jah allai marein þairhiddjedun
column6: Moreover , brethren , I would not that ye should be ignorant , how that all our fathers were under the cloud , and all passed through the sea ;

text: And did all eat the same spiritual meat ;

text: What say I then ? that the idol is any thing , or that which is offered in sacrifice to idols is any thing ?

text: For if we would judge ourselves , we should not be judged .

text2: sumamm uh skeireins razdo

text: But all these worketh that one and the selfsame Spirit , dividing to every man severally as he will .
text2: þat uþ þan all waurkeiþ ains jah sa sama ahma daileiþ sundro ƕarjammeh swaswe wili

text: For as the body is one , and hath many members , and all the members of that one body , being many , are one body : so also is Christ .
text2: swe leik raihtis ain ist iþ liþuns habaiþ managans þai þ þan liþjus allai us leika þamma ainamma managai wisandans ain ist leik swa jah Xristus

text: For by one Spirit are we all baptized into one body , whether we be Jews or Gentiles , whether we be bond or free ; and have been all made to drink into one Spirit .

text: For the body is not one member , but many .
text2: jaþ þan leik nist ains liþus ak managai

text: If the foot shall say , Because I am not the hand , I am not of the body ; is it therefore not of the body ?
text2: jabai qiþai fotus þatei ni im handus ni im þis leikis nih at þamma leika nist us þamma leika

text: And if the ear shall say , Because I am not the eye , I am not of the body ; is it therefore not of the body ?

text: If the whole body were an eye , where were the hearing ? If the whole were hearing , where were the smelling ?

text: But now hath God set the members every one of them in the body , as it hath pleased him .

text: And if they were all one member , where were the body ?
text2: iþ weseina þo alla ains liþus ƕar leik

text: But now are they many members , yet but one body .
text2: iþ nu managai liþjus iþ ain leik

text: And the eye cannot say unto the hand , I have no need of thee : nor again the head to the feet , I have no need of you .

text: Nay , much more those members of the body , which seem to be more feeble , are necessary :

text: Though I speak with the tongues of men and of angels , and have not charity , I am become as sounding brass , or a tinkling cymbal .
text2: aiþþau klismo klismjandei

text: And though I have the gift of prophecy , and understand all mysteries , and all knowledge ; and though I have all faith , so that I could remove mountains , and have not charity , I am nothing .

text: And though I bestow all my goods to feed the poor , and though I give my body to be burned , and have not charity , it profiteth me nothing .
text2: jah jabai fraatjau allos aihtins meinos jah jabai atgibau leik mein ei gabrannjaidau iþ friaþwa ni habau ni waiht botos mis taujau

text: Charity suffereth long , and is kind ; charity envieth not ; charity vaunteth not itself , is not puffed up ,
text2: friaþwa usbeisneiga ist sels ist friaþwa ni aljanoþ friaþwa ni flauteiþ ni ufblesada

text: Doth not behave itself unseemly , seeketh not her own , is not easily provoked , thinketh no evil ;

text: Rejoiceth not in iniquity , but rejoiceth in the truth ;
text2: nih faginoþ inwindiþai miþfaginoþ sunjai

text: Beareth all things , believeth all things , hopeth all things , endureth all things .
text2: allata þulaiþ allata galaubeiþ all weneiþ all gabeidiþ

text: Charity never faileth : but whether there be prophecies , they shall fail ; whether there be tongues , they shall cease ; whether there be knowledge , it shall vanish away .
text2: friaþwa aiw ni gadriusiþ iþ jaþþe praufetja gatairanda jaþþe razdos gaƕeiland jaþþe kunþi gataurniþ

text: For we know in part , and we prophesy in part .

text: But when that which is perfect is come , then that which is in part shall be done away .
text2: biþe qimiþ þatei ustauhan ist gataurniþ þatei us dailai ist

text: When I was a child , I spake as a child , I understood as a child , I thought as a child : but when I became a man , I put away childish things .

text: For now we see through a glass , darkly ; but then face to face : now I know in part ; but then shall I know even as also I am known .

text: Brethren , be not children in understanding : howbeit in malice be ye children , but in understanding be men .
text2: barniskai sijaiþ ei fraþjam fullaweisai sijaiþ

text: In the law it is written , With men of other tongues and other lips will I speak unto this people ; and yet for all that will they not hear me , saith the Lord .

text: Wherefore tongues are for a sign , not to them that believe , but to them that believe not : but prophesying serveth not for them that believe not , but for them which believe .
text2: swaei nu razdos du bandwai sind ni þaim galaubjandam ak þaim ungalaubjandam iþ praufetja ni þaim ungalaubjandam ak þaim galaubjandam

text: If therefore the whole church be come together into one place , and all speak with tongues , and there come in those that are unlearned , or unbelievers , will they not say that ye are mad ?
text2: jabai gaqimiþ alla aikklesjo samana jah rodjand razdom allai at - gaggand uþ þan inn jah unweisai aiþþau ungalaubjandans niu qiþand þatei dwalmoþ

text: But if all prophesy , and there come in one that believeth not , or one unlearned , he is convinced of all , he is judged of all :
text2: iþ jabai allai praufetjand iþ innatgaggai ƕas ungalaubjands aiþþau unweis gasakada fram allaim ussokjada fram allaim

text: And thus are the secrets of his heart made manifest ; and so falling down on his face he will worship God , and report that God is in you of a truth .
text2: þo analaugnjona hairtins is swikunþa wairþand þanuh driusands ana andawleizn inweitiþ guþ gateihands þatei bi sunjai guþ in izwis ist

text: How is it then , brethren ? when ye come together , everyone of you hath a psalm , hath a doctrine , hath a tongue , hath a revelation , hath an interpretation . Let all things be done unto edifying .
text2: ƕa nu ist broþrjus þan samaþ garinnaiþ ƕarjizuh izwara psalmon habaiþ laisein habaiþ andhulein habaiþ razda habaiþ skerein habaiþ allata du timreinai wairþai

text: If any man speak in an unknown tongue , let it be by two , or at the most by three , and that by course ; and let one interpret .
text2: jaþþe razdai ƕas rodjai bi twans aiþþau maist þrins jah

text: Moreover , brethren , I declare unto you the gospel which I preached unto you , which also ye have received , and wherein ye stand ;
text2: Aþþan kannja izwis broþrjus þatei aiwaggeli þatei merida izwis þatuh jah andnemuþ in þammei jah standiþ

text: By which also ye are saved , if ye keep in memory what I preached unto you , unless ye have believed in vain .
text2: þairh þatei jah ganisiþ in ƕo sauþo wailamerida izwis skuluþ gamunan niba sware galaubideduþ

text: For I delivered unto you first of all that which I also received , how that Christ died for our sins according to the scriptures ;
text2: atgaf auk izwis in frumistjam þatei andnam ei Xristus gaswalt faur frawaurhtins unsaros afar bokom

text: And that he was buried , and that he rose again the third day according to the scriptures :
text2: jaþ þatei ganawistroþs was jaþ þatei urrais þridjin daga afar bokom

text: And that he was seen of Cephas , then of the twelve :
text2: jaþ þatei ataugids ist Kefin jah afar þata þaim ainlibim

text: After that , he was seen of above five hundred brethren at once ; of whom the greater part remain unto this present , but some are fallen asleep .
text2: þaþroh gasaiƕans ist managizam þau fimf hundam broþre suns þizeei þai managistans sind und hita sumai þ þan gasaizlepun

text: After that , he was seen of James ; then of all the apostles .
text2: þaþroh þan ataugida sik Iakobau þaþroþ þan apaustaulum allaim

text: And last of all he was seen of me also , as of one born out of due time .
text2: iþ spedistamma allaize swaswe uswaurpai ataugida sik jah mis

text: For I am the least of the apostles , that am not meet to be called an apostle , because I persecuted the church of God .
text2: ik auk im sa smalista apaustaule ikei ni im wairþs ei haitaidau apaustaulus duþe ei wrak aikklesjon gudis

text: But by the grace of God I am what I am : and his grace which was bestowed upon me was not in vain ; but I laboured more abundantly than they all : yet not I , but the grace of God which was with me .
text2: aþþan anstai gudis im saei im jas so ansts is in mis halka ni warþ ak managizo im allaim usaiwida aþþan ni ik ak ansts gudis miþ mis

text: Therefore whether it were I or they , so we preach , and so ye believed .
text2: iþ jaþþe ik jaþþe jainai swa merjam jah swa galaubideduþ

text: Now if Christ be preached that he rose from the dead , how say some among you that there is no resurrection of the dead ?
text2: þande nu Xristus merjada þatei urrais us dauþaim ƕaiwa qiþand sumai in izwis þatei usstass dauþaim nist

text: But if there be no resurrection of the dead , then is Christ not risen :
text2: iþ jabai usstass dauþaim nist nih Xristus urrais

text: And if Christ be not risen , then is our preaching vain , and your faith is also vain .
text2: aþþan jabai Xristus ni urrais sware þau jas so mereins unsara jah so galaubeins unsara lausa

text: Yea , and we are found false witnesses of God ; because we have testified of God that he raised up Christ : whom he raised not up , if so be that the dead rise not .

text: For if the dead rise not , then is not Christ raised :

text: And if Christ be not raised , your faith is vain ; ye are yet in your sins .
text2: iþ jabai Xristus ni urrais sware jah so galaubeins izwara ist jan nauh sijuþ in frawaurhtim izwaraim

text: Then they also which are fallen asleep in Christ are perished .
text2: þanuh jaþ þai gaslepandans in Xristau fraqistnodedun

text: If in this life only we have hope in Christ , we are of all men most miserable .
text2: jabai in þizai libainai in Xristau wenjandans sijum þatainei armostai sium allaize manne

text: But now is Christ risen from the dead , and become the firstfruits of them that slept .
text2: iþ nu Xristus urrais us dauþaim anastodeins gaslepandane waurþans

text: For since by man came death , by man came also the resurrection of the dead .

text: For as in Adam all die , even so in Christ shall all be made alive .

text: But every man in his own order : Christ the firstfruits ; afterward they that are Christ ' s at his coming .
text2: aþþan ƕarjizuh in seinai tewai anastodeins Xristus þaþroþ þan þai Xristaus in quma is

text: Then cometh the end , when he shall have delivered up the kingdom to God , even the Father ; when he shall have put down all rule and all authority and power .
text2: þaþroþ þan andeis þan anafilhiþ þiudinassu guda jah attin þan gatairiþ all reikjis jah waldufnjis jah mahtais

text: For he must reign , till he hath put all enemies under his feet .

text: The last enemy that shall be destroyed is death .
text2: all uh auk ufhnaiwida uf fotuns imma aftumista fijands gatairada dauþus

text: For he hath put all things under his feet . But when he saith , all things are put under him , it is manifest that he is excepted , which did put all things under him .
text2: iþ biþe qiþiþ alla ufhnaiwida sind bairht þatei inu þana izei ufhnaiwida uf ina þo alla

text: And when all things shall be subdued unto him , then shall the Son also himself be subject unto him that put all things under him , that God may be all in all .

text: Else what shall they do which are baptized for the dead , if the dead rise not at all ? why are they then baptized for the dead ?
text2: aiþþau ƕa waurkjand þai daupjandans faur dauþans jabai allis dauþans ni urreisand duƕe þau daupjand faur ins

text: And why stand we in jeopardy every hour ?
text2: duƕe þau weis bireikjai sijum ƕeilo ƕoh

text: I protest by your rejoicing which I have in Christ Jesus our Lord , I die daily .
text2: daga ƕammeh gaswiltandans in izwaraizos ƕoftuljos broþrjus þoei haba in Xristau Iesu fraujin unsaramma

text: If after the manner of men I have fought with beasts at Ephesus , what advantageth it me , if the dead rise not ? let us eat and drink ; for to morrow we die .

text: Be not deceived : evil communications corrupt good manners .
text2: ni afairzjaindau riurjand sidu godana gawaurdja ubila

text: Awake to righteousness , and sin not ; for some have not the knowledge of God : I speak this to your shame .

text: But some man will say , How are the dead raised up ? and with what body do they come ?

text: Howbeit that was not first which is spiritual , but that which is natural ; and afterward that which is spiritual .
text2: ahmeino

text: The first man is of the earth , earthy : the second man is the Lord from heaven .
text2: sa fruma manna us airþai muldeins sa anþar manna frauja us himina

text: As is the earthy , such are they also that are earthy : and as is the heavenly , such are they also that are heavenly .
text2: ƕileiks sa muldeina swaleikai jah þai muldeinans ƕileiks sa ufarhiminakunda swaleikai jah þai ufarhiminakundans

text: And as we have borne the image of the earthy , we shall also bear the image of the heavenly .

text: Now this I say , brethren , that flesh and blood cannot inherit the kingdom of God ; neither doth corruption inherit incorruption .

text: Behold , I shew you a mystery ; We shall not all sleep , but we shall all be changed ,

text: In a moment , in the twinkling of an eye , at the last trump : for the trumpet shall sound , and the dead shall be raised incorruptible , and we shall be changed .

text: For this corruptible must put on incorruption , and this mortal must put on immortality .

text: So when this corruptible shall have put on incorruption , and this mortal shall have put on immortality , then shall be brought to pass the saying that is written , Death is swallowed up in victory .

text: O death , where is thy sting ? O grave , where is thy victory ?

text: The sting of death is sin ; and the strength of sin is the law .
text2: aþþan gazds dauþaus frawaurhts iþ mahts frawaurhtais witoþ

text: But thanks be to God , which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ .

text: Therefore , my beloved brethren , be ye stedfast , unmoveable , always abounding in the work of the Lord , forasmuch as ye know that your labour is not in vain in the Lord .

text: Now concerning the collection for the saints , as I have given order to the churches of Galatia , even so do ye .

text: Upon the first day of the week let every one of you lay by him in store , as God hath prospered him , that there be no gatherings when I come .

text: And when I come , whomsoever ye shall approve by your letters , them will I send to bring your liberality unto Jerusalem .

text: And if it be meet that I go also , they shall go with me .

text2: aþþan qima at izwis þan Makidonja usleiþa Makidonja auk þairhgagga

text: And it may be that I will abide , yea , and winter with you , that ye may bring me on my journey whithersoever I go .

text: For I will not see you now by the way ; but I trust to tarry a while with you , if the Lord permit .

text: But I will tarry at Ephesus until Pentecost .

text: For a great door and effectual is opened unto me , and there are many adversaries .

text: Now if Timotheus come , see that he may be with you without fear : for he worketh the work of the Lord , as I also do .
text2: aþþan jabai qimai Teimauþaius saiƕiþ ei unagands sijai at izwis unte waurstw fraujins waurkeiþ swaswe jah ik

text: Let no man therefore despise him : but conduct him forth in peace , that he may come unto me : for I look for him with the brethren .

text: As touching our brother Apollos , I greatly desired him to come unto you with the brethren : but his will was not at all to come at this time ; but he will come when he shall have convenient time .

text: Watch ye , stand fast in the faith , quit you like men , be strong .

text: Let all your things be done with charity .
text2: allata izwar in friaþwai wairþai

text: I beseech you , brethren , ( ye know the house of Stephanas , that it is the firstfruits of Achaia , and that they have addicted themselves to the ministry of the saints , )

text: That ye submit yourselves unto such , and to every one that helpeth with us , and laboureth .

text: I am glad of the coming of Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus : for that which was lacking on your part they have supplied .

text: For they have refreshed my spirit and yours : therefore acknowledge ye them that are such .

text: To whom be glory for ever and ever . Amen .

text: I marvel that ye are so soon removed from him that called you into the grace of Christ unto another gospel :
text2: sildaleikja ei swa sprauto afwandjanda af þamma laþondin izwis in anstai Xristaus du anþaramma aiwaggelja

text: Which is not another ; but there be some that trouble you , and would pervert the gospel of Christ .

text: Afterwards I came into the regions of Syria and Cilicia ;
text2: þaþro qam ana fera Saurais jah Kileikiais

text: And was unknown by face unto the churches of Judaea which were in Christ :
text2: unkunþs wlita aikklesjom Iudaias þaim in Xristau

text: But they had heard only , That he which persecuted us in times past now preacheth the faith which once he destroyed .

text: And they glorified God in me .

text: Then fourteen years after I went up again to Jerusalem with Barnabas , and took Titus with me also .
text2: þaþroh bi fidwortaihun jera usiddja aftra in Iairusaulwma miþ Barnabin ganimands miþ mis jah Teitu

text: And I went up by revelation , and communicated unto them that gospel which I preach among the Gentiles , but privately to them which were of reputation , lest by any means I should run , or had run , in vain .
text2: uz - iddja uþ þan bi andhuleinai jah ussok im aiwaggeli þatei merja in þiudos iþ sundro þaimei þuhta ibai sware rinnau aiþþau runnjau

text: But neither Titus , who was with me , being a Greek , was compelled to be circumcised :

text: And that because of false brethren unawares brought in , who came in privily to spy out our liberty which we have in Christ Jesus , that they might bring us into bondage :
text2: aþþan in þize ufsliupandane galiugabroþre þaiei innufslupun biniuhsjan freijhals unsarana þanei aihum in Xristau Iesu ei unsis gaþiwaidedeina

text: To whom we gave place by subjection , no , not for an hour ; that the truth of the gospel might continue with you .

text: But of these who seemed to be somewhat , ( whatsoever they were , it maketh no matter to me : God accepteth no man ' s person : ) for they who seemed to be somewhat in conference added nothing to me :

text: But contrariwise , when they saw that the gospel of the uncircumcision was committed unto me , as the gospel of the circumcision was unto Peter ;

text: ( For he that wrought effectually in Peter to the apostleship of the circumcision , the same was mighty in me toward the Gentiles : )

text: And when James , Cephas , and John , who seemed to be pillars , perceived the grace that was given unto me , they gave to me and Barnabas the right hands of fellowship ; that we should go unto the heathen , and they unto the circumcision .

text: And the other Jews dissembled likewise with him ; insomuch that Barnabas also was carried away with their dissimulation .
text2: jah miþlitidedun imma þai anþarai Iudaieis swaei Barnabas miþgatauhans warþ þizai litai ize

text: But when I saw that they walked not uprightly according to the truth of the gospel , I said unto Peter before them all , If thou , being a Jew , livest after the manner of Gentiles , and not as do the Jews , why compellest thou the Gentiles to live as do the Jews ?
text2: ake biþe ik gasaƕ þatei ni raihtaba gaggand du sunjai aiwaggeljons qaþ du Paitrau faura allaim jabai þu Iudaius wisands þiudisko libais jah ni iudaiwisko ƕaiwa þiudos baideis iudaiwiskon

text: We who are Jews by nature , and not sinners of the Gentiles ,
text2: weis raihtis wistai Iudaieis wisandans jah ni us þiudom frawaurhtai

text: Knowing that a man is not justified by the works of the law , but by the faith of Jesus Christ , even we have believed in Jesus Christ , that we might be justified by the faith of Christ , and not by the works of the law : for by the works of the law shall no flesh be justified .
text2: aþþan witandans þatei ni wairþiþ garaihts manna us waurstwam witodis alja þairh galaubein Iesuis Xristaus jah weis in Xristau Iesua galaubidedum ei garaihtai wairþaima us galaubeinai Xristaus Iesuis jah ni us waurstwam witodis unte ni wairþiþ garaihts us waurstwam witodis ainhun leike

text: But if , while we seek to be justified by Christ , we ourselves also are found sinners , is therefore Christ the minister of sin ? God forbid .
text2: sokjandans ei garaihtai domjaindau in Xristau bigitanai sijum jas silbans frawaurhtai þannu Xristus frawaurhtais andbahts nis sijai

text: For if I build again the things which I destroyed , I make myself a transgressor .
text2: unte jabai þatei gatar þata aftra timrja missataujandan mik silban ustaiknja

text: For I through the law am dead to the law , that I might live unto God .
text2: unte ik þairh witoþ witoda gaswalt ei guda libau

text: I am crucified with Christ : nevertheless I live ; yet not I , but Christ liveth in me : and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God , who loved me , and gave himself for me .
text2: Xristau miþushramiþs warþ iþ liba nu ni þanaseiþs ik iþ libaiþ in mis Xristus aþþan þatei nu liba in leika in galaubeinai liba sunus gudis þis frijondins mik jah atgibandins sik silban faur mik

text: I do not frustrate the grace of God : for if righteousness come by the law , then Christ is dead in vain .
text2: ni faurqiþa anstai gudis unte jabai þairh witoþ garaihtei aiþþau jah Xristus sware gaswalt

text: O foolish Galatians , who hath bewitched you , that ye should not obey the truth , before whose eyes Jesus Christ hath been evidently set forth , crucified among you ?
text2: O unfrodans Galateis ƕas izwis afhugida sunjai ni ufhausjan izwizei faura augam Iesus Xristus faurameliþs was in izwis ushramiþs

text: This only would I learn of you , Received ye the Spirit by the works of the law , or by the hearing of faith ?
text2: þat ain wiljau witan fram izwis uz u waurstwam witodis ahman nemuþ þau uz u gahauseinai galaubeinais

text: Are ye so foolish ? having begun in the Spirit , are ye now made perfect by the flesh ?
text2: swa unfroþans sijuþ anastodjandans ahmin nu leika ustiuhiþ

text: Have ye suffered so many things in vain ? if it be yet in vain .
text2: swa filu gawunnuþ sware aþþan jabai sware

text: He therefore that ministereth to you the Spirit , and worketh miracles among you , doeth he it by the works of the law , or by the hearing of faith ?
text2: saei nu andstaldiþ izwis ahmin jah waurkeiþ mahtins in izwis uz u waurstwam witodis þau uz u gahauseinai galaubeinais

text: Even as Abraham believed God , and it was accounted to him for righteousness .
text2: swaswe jah Abraham galaubida guda

text: For as many of you as have been baptized into Christ have put on Christ .
text2: swa managai auk swe in Xristau daupidai wesuþ Xristau gahamodai sijuþ

text: There is neither Jew nor Greek , there is neither bond nor free , there is neither male nor female : for ye are all one in Christ Jesus .
text2: nist Judaius nih Kreks nist skalks nih freis nist gumakund nih qinakund unte allai jus ain sijuþ in Xristau Iesu

text: And if ye be Christ ' s , then are ye Abraham ' s seed , and heirs according to the promise .
text2: aþþan þande jus Xristaus þannu Abrahamis fraiw sijuþ jab bi gahaitam arbjans

text: Now I say , That the heir , as long as he is a child , differeth nothing from a servant , though he be lord of all ;
text2: Aþþan qiþa swalaud melis swe arbinumja niuklahs ist ni und waiht iusiza ist skalka frauja allaize wisands

text: But is under tutors and governors until the time appointed of the father .
text2: akei uf raginjam ist jah fauragaggam und garehsn attins

text: Even so we , when we were children , were in bondage under the elements of the world :
text2: swa jah weis þan wesum barniskai uf stabim þis fairƕaus wesum skalkinondans

text: But when the fulness of the time was come , God sent forth his Son , made of a woman , made under the law ,
text2: iþ biþe qam usfulleins melis insandida guþ sunu seinana waurþanana us qinon waurþanana uf witoda

text: To redeem them that were under the law , that we might receive the adoption of sons .
text2: ei þans uf witoda usbauhtedi ei suniwe sibja andnimaima

text: And because ye are sons , God hath sent forth the Spirit of his Son into your hearts , crying , Abba , Father .
text2: aþþan þatei sijuþ jus sunjus gudis insandida guþ ahman sunaus seinis in hairtona izwara hropjandan abba fadar

text: Wherefore thou art no more a servant , but a son ; and if a son , then an heir of God through Christ .
text2: swaei ni þanaseiþs is skalks ak sunus iþ þande sunus jah arbja gudis þairh Xristu

text: Howbeit then , when ye knew not God , ye did service unto them which by nature are no gods .
text2: akei þan sweþauh ni kunnandans guþ þaim þoei wistai ni sind guda skalkinodeduþ

text: But now , after that ye have known God , or rather are known of God , how turn ye again to the weak and beggarly elements , whereunto ye desire again to be in bondage ?
text2: iþ nu sai ufkunnandans guþ maiz uþ þan gakunnaidai fram guda ƕaiwa gawandideduþ izwis aftra du þaim unmahteigam jah halkam stabim þaimei aftra iupana skalkinon wileiþ

text: Ye observe days , and months , and times , and years .
text2: dagam witaiþ jah menoþum jah melam jah aþnam

text: I am afraid of you , lest I have bestowed upon you labour in vain .
text2: og izwis ibai sware arbaididedjau in izwis

text: Brethren , I beseech you , be as I am ; for I am as ye are : ye have not injured me at all .
text2: aþþan wairþaiþ swe ik unte jah ik swe jus broþrjus bidja izwis ni waiht mis gaskoþuþ

text: Ye know how through infirmity of the flesh I preached the gospel unto you at the first .
text2: wituþ þatei þairh siukein leikis aiwaggelida izwis þata frumo

text: And my temptation which was in my flesh ye despised not , nor rejected ; but received me as an angel of God , even as Christ Jesus .
text2: jah fraistubnjai ana leika meinamma ni frakunþeduþ ni andspiwuþ ak swe aggelu gudis andnemuþ mik swe Xristu Iesu

text: Where is then the blessedness ye spake of ? for I bear you record , that , if it had been possible , ye would have plucked out your own eyes , and have given them to me .
text2: ƕileika was nu audagei izwara weitwodja auk izwis þatei jabai mahteig wesi augona izwara usgrabandans atgebeiþ mis

text: Am I therefore become your enemy , because I tell you the truth ?
text2: iþ nu swe fijands izwis warþ sunja gateihands izwis

text: They zealously affect you , but not well ; yea , they would exclude you , that ye might affect them .
text2: aljanond izwis ni waila ak usletan izwis wileina ei im aljanoþ

text: But it is good to be zealously affected always in a good thing , and not only when I am present with you .
text2: aþþan goþ ist aljanon in godamma sinteino jan ni þatainei in þammei ik sijau andwairþs at izwis

text: My little children , of whom I travail in birth again until Christ be formed in you ,
text2: barnilona meina þanzei aftra fita unte gabairhtjaidau Xristus in izwis

text: I desire to be present with you now , and to change my voice ; for I stand in doubt of you .
text2: aþþan wilda qiman at izwis nu jah inmaidjan stibna meina unte afslauþiþs im in izwis

text: Tell me , ye that desire to be under the law , do ye not hear the law ?
text2: qiþiþ mis jus uf witoda wiljandans wisan þata witoþ niu hauseiþ

text: For it is written , that Abraham had two sons , the one by a bondmaid , the other by a freewoman .
text2: gameliþ ist auk þatei Abraham twans aihta sununs ainana us þiujai jah ainana us frijai

text: But he who was of the bondwoman was born after the flesh ; but he of the freewoman was by promise .
text2: akei þan sa us þiujai bi leika

text: Which things are an allegory : for these are the two covenants ; the one from the mount Sinai , which gendereth to bondage , which is Agar .
text2: þatei sind aljaleikodos þos auk sind twos triggwos aina raihtis af fairgunja Seina in þiwadw bairandei sei ist Agar

text: For this Agar is mount Sinai in Arabia , and answereth to Jerusalem which now is , and is in bondage with her children .
text2: Seina fairguni ist in Arabia gamarkoþ þizai nu Iairusalem iþ skalkinoþ miþ seinaim barnam

text: But Jerusalem which is above is free , which is the mother of us all .
text2: iþ so iupa Iairusalem frija ist sei ist aiþei unsara

text: For it is written , Rejoice , thou barren that bearest not ; break forth and cry , thou that travailest not : for the desolate hath many more children than she which hath an husband .
text2: gameliþ ist auk sifai stairo so unbairandei tarmei jah hropei so ni fitandei unte managa barna þizos auþjons mais þau þizos aigandeins aban

text: Now we , brethren , as Isaac was , are the children of promise .
text2: aþþan weis broþrjus bi Isakis gahaita barna sium

text: But as then he that was born after the flesh persecuted him that was born after the Spirit , even so it is now .
text2: akei þan swaswe sa bi leika gabaurana wrak þana bi ahmin swah jah nu

text: Nevertheless what saith the scripture ? Cast out the bondwoman and her son : for the son of the bondwoman shall not be heir with the son of the freewoman .
text2: akei ƕa qiþiþ þata gamelido uswairp þizai þiujai jah þamma sunau izos unte ni nimiþ arbi sunus þiujos miþ sunau frijaizos

text: So then , brethren , we are not children of the bondwoman , but of the free .
text2: þannu nu broþrjus ni sijum þiujos barna ak frijaizos

text: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free , and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage .
text2: þammei freihalsa uns Xristus frijans brahta standaiþ nu jah ni aftra skalkinassaus jukuzja usþulaiþ

text: Behold , I Paul say unto you , that if ye be circumcised , Christ shall profit you nothing .
text2: sai ik Pawlus qiþa izwis þatei jabai bimaitiþ Xristus izwis nist du botai

text: For I testify again to every man that is circumcised , that he is a debtor to do the whole law .
text2: aþþan weitwodja ƕammeh manne bimaitanaize þatei skula ist all witoþ taujan

text: Christ is become of no effect unto you , whosoever of you are justified by the law ; ye are fallen from grace .
text2: lausai sijuþ af Xristau juzei in witoda garaihtans qiþiþ izwis us anstai usdrusuþ

text: For we through the Spirit wait for the hope of righteousness by faith .
text2: aþþan weis ahmin us galaubeinai wenais garaihteins beidam

text: For in Jesus Christ neither circumcision availeth anything , nor uncircumcision ; but faith which worketh by love .
text2: unte in Xristu Iesu nih bimait waiht gamag nih faurafilli ak galaubeins þairh friaþwa waurstweiga

text: Ye did run well ; who did hinder you that ye should not obey the truth ?
text2: runnuþ waila ƕas izwis galatida sunjai ni ufhausjan

text: This persuasion cometh not of him that calleth you .
text2: so gakunds ni us þamma laþondin izwis ist

text: A little leaven leaveneth the whole lump .
text2: leitil beistis allana daig distairiþ

text: I have confidence in you through the Lord , that ye will be none otherwise minded : but he that troubleth you shall bear his judgment , whosoever he be .
text2: ik gatraua in izwis in fraujin þatei ni waiht aljis hugjiþ aþþan sa drobjands izwis sa bairai þo wargiþa saƕazuh saei sijai

text: And I , brethren , if I yet preach circumcision , why do I yet suffer persecution ? then is the offence of the cross ceased .
text2: aþþan ik broþrjus jabai bimait merjau duƕe þanamais wrikada þannu gatauran ist marzeins galgins

text: I would they were even cut off which trouble you .
text2: wainei jah usmaitaindau þai drobjandans izwis

text: For , brethren , ye have been called unto liberty ; only use not liberty for an occasion to the flesh , but by love serve one another .
text2: jus auk du freihalsa laþodai sijuþ broþrjus þatainei ibai þana freihals du lewa leikis taujaiþ ak in friaþwos ahmins skalkinoþ izwis misso

text: For all the law is fulfilled in one word , even in this ; Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: unte all witoþ in izwis in ainamma waurda usfulljada in þamma frijos neƕundjan þeinana swe þuk silban

text: But if ye bite and devour one another , take heed that ye be not consumed one of another .
text2: iþ jabai izwis misso beitiþ jah fairinoþ saiƕiþ ibai fram izwis misso fraqimaindau

text: This I say then , Walk in the Spirit , and ye shall not fulful the lust of the flesh .
text2: aþþan qiþa ei ahmin gaggaiþ jah lustu leikis ni ustiuhaiþ

text: For the flesh lusteth against the Spirit , and the Spirit against the flesh : and these are contrary the one to the other : so that ye cannot do the things that ye would .
text2: iþ ahma wiþra leik þo nu sis misso andstandand ei ni þisƕah þatei wileiþ þata taujiþ

text: But if ye be led of the Spirit , ye are not under the law .
text2: aþþan jabai ahmin tiuhanda ni sijuþ uf witoda

text: Now the works of the flesh are manifest , which are these ; Adultery , fornication , uncleanness , lasciviousness ,
text2: aþþan swikunþa sind waurstwa leikis þatei ist horinassus kalkinassus unhrainiþa aglaitei

text: Idolatry , witchcraft , hatred , variance , emulations , wrath , strife , seditions , heresies ,
text2: galiugagude skalkinassus lubjaleisei fiaþwos haifsteis aljan hatiza jiukos twistasseis hairaiseis

text: Envyings , murders , drunkenness , revellings , and such like : of the which I tell you before , as I have also told you in time past , that they which do such things shall not inherit the kingdom of God .
text2: neiþa maurþra drugkaneins gabauros jah þata galeiko þaim þatei fauraqiþa izwis swe ju fauraqaþ þatei þai þata swaleik taujandans þiudangardjos gudis arbjans ni wairþand

text: But the fruit of the Spirit is love , joy , peace , longsuffering , gentleness , goodness , faith ,
text2: iþ akran ahmins ist frijaþwa faheþs gawairþi usbeisnei selei bleiþei galaubeins
column6: But the fruit of the Spirit is love , joy , peace , longsuffering , gentleness , goodness , faith ,

text: But the fruit of the Spirit is love , joy , peace , longsuffering , gentleness , goodness , faith ,
text2: iþ akran ahmins ist frijaþwa faheþs gawairþi usbeisnei selei bleiþei galaubeins
column6: But the fruit of the Spirit is love , joy , peace , longsuffering , gentleness , goodness , faith ,

text: Meekness , temperance : against such there is no law .
text2: qairrei gahobains swiknei
column6: Meekness , temperance : against such there is no law .
column8: wiþra þo swaleika nist witoþ

text: Meekness , temperance : against such there is no law .
text2: qairrei gahobains swiknei
column6: Meekness , temperance : against such there is no law .
column8: wiþra þo swaleika nist witoþ

text: And they that are Christ ' s have crucified the flesh with the affections and lusts .
text2: iþ þaiei sind Xristaus leik sein ushramidedun miþ winnom jah lustum

text: If we live in the Spirit , let us also walk in the Spirit .
text2: jabai libam ahmin ahmin jah gaggam

text: Let us not be desirous of vain glory , provoking one another , envying one another .
text2: ni wairþaima flautai uns misso ushaitandans misso in neiþa wisandans

text: Brethren , if a man be overtaken in a fault , ye which are spiritual , restore such an one in the spirit of meekness ; considering thyself , lest thou also be tempted .
text2: Broþrjus jabai gafahaidau manna in ƕizai missadede jus þai ahmeinans gaþwastjaiþ þana swaleikana in ahmin qairreins andsaiƕands þuk silban iba jah þu fraisaizau

text: Bear ye one another ' s burdens , and so fulfil the law of Christ .
text2: izwaros misso kauriþos bairaiþ jah swa usfulleiþ witoþ Xristaus

text: For if a man think himself to be something , when he is nothing , he deceiveth himself .
text2: iþ jabai þugkeiþ ƕas ƕa wisan ni waiht wisands sis silbin fraþjamarzeins ist

text: But let every man prove his own work , and then shall he have rejoicing in himself alone , and not in another .
text2: iþ waurstw sein silbins kiusai ƕarjizuh jah þan in sis silbin ƕoftulja habai jah ni in anþaramma

text: For every man shall bear his own burden .
text2: ƕarjizuh auk swesa baurþein bairiþ

text: Let him that is taught in the word communicate unto him that teacheth in all good things .
text2: aþþan gamainjai sa laisida waurda þamma laisjandin in allaim godaim is

text: Be not deceived ; God is not mocked : for whatsoever a man soweth , that shall he also reap .
text2: ni wairþaiþ airzjai guþ ni bilaikada manna auk þatei saijiþ þata jah sneiþiþ

text: For he that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption ; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting .
text2: unte saei saijiþ in leika seinamma us þamma leika jah sneiþiþ riurein iþ saei saijiþ in ahmin us ahmin jah sneiþiþ libain aiweinon

text: And let us not be weary in well doing : for in due season we shall reap , if we faint not .
text2: aþþan þata godo taujandans ni wairþaima usgrudjans unte at mel swesata sneiþam ni afmauidai

text: As we have therefore opportunity , let us do good unto all men , especially unto them who are of the household of faith .
text2: þannu nu þandei mel habam waurkjam þiuþ wiþra allans þishun wiþra swesans galaubeinai

text: Ye see how large a letter I have written unto you with mine own hand .
text2: sai ƕileikaim bokom gamelida izwis meinai handau

text: As many as desire to make a fair shew in the flesh , they constrain you to be circumcised ; only lest they should suffer persecution for the cross of Christ .
text2: swa managai swe wileina samjan sis in leika þai nauþjand izwis bimaitan ei ƕeh wrakja galgins Xristaus ni winnaina

text: For neither they themselves who are circumcised keep the law ; but desire to have you circumcised , that they may glory in your flesh .
text2: niþ þan sweþauh þai ize bimaitanai sind witoþ fastand ak wileina izwis bimaitan ei in izwaramma leika ƕopaina

text: But God forbid that I should glory , save in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ , by whom the world is crucified unto me , and I unto the world .
text2: iþ mis ni sijai ƕopan ni in waihtai niba in galgins fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus þairh þanei mis fairƕus ushramiþs ist jah ik fairƕau

text: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth anything , nor uncircumcision , but a new creature .
text2: unte ni bimait waiht ist nih faurafilli ak niuja gaskafts

text: And as many as walk according to this rule , peace be on them , and mercy , and upon the Israel of God .
text2: jah swa managai swe þizai garaideinai galaistans sind gawairþi ana im jah armaio jah ana Israela gudis

text: From henceforth let no man trouble me : for I bear in my body the marks of the Lord Jesus .
text2: þanamais arbaide ni ainshun mis gansjai unte ik stakins Iesuis ana leika meinamma baira

text: Brethren , the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit . Amen .
text2: ansts fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus miþ ahmin izwaramma broþrjus amen

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , to the saints which are at Ephesus , and to the faithful in Christ Jesus :
text2: Pawlus apaustaulus Xristaus Iesuis þairh wiljan gudis þaim weiham þaim wisandam in Aifaison jah triggwaim in Xristau Iesu

text: Grace be to you , and peace , from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: ansts izwis jah gawairþi fram guda attin unsaramma jah fraujin Iesu Xristau

text: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , who hath blessed us with all spiritual blessings in heavenly places in Christ :
text2: þiuþiþs guþ jah atta fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus izei gaþiuþida uns ana allai þiuþeinai ahmeinai in himinakundaim in Xristau

text: According as he hath chosen us in him before the foundation of the world , that we should be holy and without blame before him in love :
text2: swaswe gawalida uns in imma faur gasatein fairƕaus ei sijaima weihai jah unwammai in andwairþja is in frijaþwai

text: Having predestinated us unto the adoption of children by Jesus Christ to himself , according to the good pleasure of his will ,
text2: fauragarairoþ uns du suniwe gadedai þairh Iesu Xristu in ina bi leikainai wiljins seinis

text: To the praise of the glory of his grace , wherein he hath made us accepted in the beloved .
text2: du hazeinai wulþaus anstais seinaizos in þizaiei ansteigs was uns in þamma liubin sunau seinamma

text: In whom we have redemption through his blood , the forgiveness of sins , according to the riches of his grace ;
text2: in þammei habam faurbauht fralet frawaurhte þairh bloþ is bi gabein wulþaus anstais is

text: Wherein he hath abounded toward us in all wisdom and prudence ;
text2: þoei ufarassau ganohida in uns in allai handugein jah frodein

text: Having made known unto us the mystery of his will , according to his good pleasure which he hath purposed in himself :
text2: kannjan unsis runa wiljins seinis bi wiljin saei fauragaleikaida imma

text: That in the dispensation of the fulness of times he might gather together in one all things in Christ , both which are in heaven , and which are on earth ; even in him :
text2: du fauragaggja usfulleinais mele aftra usfulljan alla in Xristau þo ana himinam jaþ þo ana airþai in imma

text: In whom also we have obtained an inheritance , being predestinated according to the purpose of him who worketh all things after the counsel of his own will :
text2: in þammei hlauts gasatidai wesum fauragaredanai bi wiljin gudis þis alla in allaim waurkjandins bi muna wiljins seinis

text: That we should be to the praise of his glory , who first trusted in Christ .
text2: ei sijaima weis du hazeinai wulþaus is þai faurawenjandans in Xristau

text: In whom ye also trusted , after that ye heard the word of truth , the gospel of your salvation : in whom also after that ye believed , ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise ,
text2: in þammei jah jus gahausjandans waurd sunjus aiwaggeli ganistais izwaraizos þammei galaubjandans gasiglidai waurþuþ ahmin gahaitis þamma weihin

text: Which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession , unto the praise of his glory .
text2: izei ist wadi arbjis unsaris du faurbauhtai gafreideinais du hazeinai wulþaus is

text: Wherefore I also , after I heard of your faith in the Lord Jesus , and love unto all the saints ,
text2: duþþe jah ik gahausjands izwara galaubein in fraujin Iesu Xristau jah frijaþwa in allans þans weihans

text: Cease not to give thanks for you , making mention of you in my prayers ;
text2: unsweibands awiliudo in izwara gamund waurkjands in bidom meinaim

text: That the God of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of glory , may give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him :
text2: ei guþ fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus atta wulþaus gibai izwis ahman handugeins jah andhuleinais in ufkunþja seinamma
column6: That the God of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of glory , may give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him :

text: That the God of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of glory , may give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him :
text2: ei guþ fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus atta wulþaus gibai izwis ahman handugeins jah andhuleinais in ufkunþja seinamma
column6: That the God of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of glory , may give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him :

text: The eyes of your understanding being enlightened ; that ye may know what is the hope of his calling , and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints ,
text2: inliuhtida augona hairtins izwaris ei witeiþ jus ƕa ist wens laþonais is ƕileik uh gabei wulþaus arbjis is in weihaim
column6: The eyes of your understanding being enlightened ; that ye may know what is the hope of his calling , and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints ,

text: The eyes of your understanding being enlightened ; that ye may know what is the hope of his calling , and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints ,
text2: inliuhtida augona hairtins izwaris ei witeiþ jus ƕa ist wens laþonais is ƕileik uh gabei wulþaus arbjis is in weihaim
column6: The eyes of your understanding being enlightened ; that ye may know what is the hope of his calling , and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints ,

text: And what is the exceeding greatness of his power to usward who believe , according to the working of his mighty power ,
text2: jah ƕa ufarassus mikileins mahtais is in uns þaim galaubjandam bi waurstwa mahtais swinþeins is

text: Which he wrought in Christ , when he raised him from the dead , and set him at his own right hand in the heavenly places ,
text2: þatei gawaurhta in Xristau urraisjands ina us dauþaim jah gasatida in taihswon seinai in himinam

text: Far above all principality , and power , and might , and dominion , and every name that is named , not only in this world , but also in that which is to come :
text2: ufaro allaize reikje jah waldufnje jah mahte jah fraujinassiwe jah allaize namne namnidaize ni þatainei in þamma aiwa ak jah in þamma anawairþin

text: And hath put all things under his feet , and gave him to be the head over all things to the church ,
text2: jah alla ufhnaiwida uf fotuns imma jah ina atgaf haubiþ ufar alla aikklesjon

text: Which is his body , the fulness of him that filleth all in all .
text2: sei ist leik is fullo þis alla in allaim usfulljandins

text: And you hath he quickened , who were dead in trespasses and sins ;
text2: Jah izwis wisandans dauþans missadedim jah frawaurhtim izwaraim

text: Wherein in time past ye walked according to the course of this world , according to the prince of the power of the air , the spirit that now worketh in the children of disobedience :
text2: in þaimei simle iddjeduþ bi þizai aldai þis fairƕaus bi reik waldufnjis luftaus ahmins þis nu waurkjandins in sunum ungalaubeinais

text: Among whom also we all had our conversation in times past in the lusts of our flesh , fulfilling the desires of the flesh and of the mind ; and were by nature the children of wrath , even as others .
text2: in þaimei jah weis allai usmetum suman in lustum leikis unsaris taujandans wiljans leikis jah gamitone jah wesum wistai barna hatize swaswe jah þai anþarai

text: But God , who is rich in mercy , for his great love wherewith he loved us ,
text2: iþ guþ gabigs wisands in armahairtein in þizos managons frijaþwos þizaiei frijoda uns

text: Even when we were dead in sins , hath quickened us together with Christ , ( by grace ye are saved ; )
text2: jah wisandans uns dauþans frawaurhtim miþgaqiwida uns Xristau anstai sijuþ ganasidai

text: And hath raised us up together , and made us sit together in heavenly places in Christ Jesus :
text2: jah miþurraisida jah miþgasatida in himinakundaim in Xristau Iesu

text: That in the ages to come he might shew the exceeding riches of his grace in his kindness toward us through Christ Jesus .
text2: ei ataugjai in aldim þaim anagaggandeim ufarassu gabeins anstais seinaizos in selein bi uns in Xristau Iesu

text: For by grace are ye saved through faith ; and that not of yourselves : it is the gift of God :
text2: unte anstai siuþ ganasidai þairh galaubein jah þata ni us izwis ak gudis giba ist

text: Not of works , lest any man should boast .
text2: ni us waurstwam ei ƕas ni ƕopai

text: For we are his workmanship , created in Christ Jesus unto good works , which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them .
text2: ak is sium taui gaskapanai in Xristau Iesu du waurstwam godaim þoei fauragamanwida guþ ei in þaim gaggaima

text: Wherefore remember , that ye being in time past Gentiles in the flesh , who are called Uncircumcision by that which is called the Circumcision in the flesh made by hands ;
text2: duþþe gamuneiþ þatei jus þiudos simle wesuþ in leika þai namnidans unbimaitanai fram þizai namnidon bimait in leika handuwaurht

text: That at that time ye were without Christ , being aliens from the commonwealth of Israel , and strangers from the covenants of promise , having no hope , and without God in the world :
text2: unte wesuþ þan in jainamma mela inu Xristu framaþjai usmetis Israelis jah gasteis gahaite trausteis wen ni habandans jah gudalausai in manasedai

text: But now in Christ Jesus ye who sometimes were far off are made nigh by the blood of Christ .
text2: iþ nu sai in Xristau Iesu jus juzei simle wesuþ fairra waurþuþ neƕa in bloþa Xristaus

text: For he is our peace , who hath made both one , and hath broken down the middle wall of partition between us ;
text2: sa auk ist gawairþi unsar saei gatawida þo ba du samin jah midgardiwaddju faþos gatairands

text: Having abolished in his flesh the enmity , even the law of commandments contained in ordinances ; for to make in himself of twain one new man , so making peace ;
text2: fijaþwa ana leika seinamma witoþ anabusne garaideinim gatairands ei þans twans gaskopi in sis silbin du ainamma niujamma mann waurkjands gawairþi

text: And that he might reconcile both unto God in one body by the cross , having slain the enmity thereby :
text2: jah gafriþodedi þans bans in ainamma leika guda þairh galgan afslahands fijaþwa in sis silbin

text: And came and preached peace to you which were afar off , and to them that were nigh .
text2: jah qimands wailamerida gawairþi izwis juzei fairra jah gawairþi þaim ize neƕa

text: For through him we both have access by one Spirit unto the Father .
text2: unte þairh ina habam atgagg bajoþs in ainamma ahmin du attin

text: Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners , but fellowcitizens with the saints , and of the household of God ;
text2: sai nu ni sijuþ gasteis jah aljakonjai ak sijuþ gabaurgjans þaim weiham jah ingardjans gudis
column6: Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners , but fellowcitizens with the saints , and of the household of God ;

text: Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners , but fellowcitizens with the saints , and of the household of God ;
text2: sai nu ni sijuþ gasteis jah aljakonjai ak sijuþ gabaurgjans þaim weiham jah ingardjans gudis
column6: Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners , but fellowcitizens with the saints , and of the household of God ;

text: And are built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets , Jesus Christ himself being the chief corner stone ;
text2: anatimridai

text: In whom all the building fitly framed together groweth unto an holy temple in the Lord :
text2: in þammei alla gatimrjo gagatiloda wahseiþ du alh weihai in fraujin

text: In whom ye also are builded together for an habitation of God through the Spirit .
text2: in þammei jah jus miþgatimridai sijuþ du bauainai gudis in ahmin

text: For this cause I Paul , the prisoner of Jesus Christ for you Gentiles ,
text2: In þizozei waihtais ik Pawlus bandja Xristaus Iesuis in izwara þiudo

text: If ye have heard of the dispensation of the grace of God which is given me to youward :
text2: jabai sweþauh hausideduþ fauragaggi gudis anstais sei gibana ist mis in izwis

text: How that by revelation he made known unto me the mystery ; ( as I wrote afore in few words ,
text2: unte bi andhuleinai gakannida was mis so runa swe fauragamelida in leitilamma

text: Whereby , when ye read , ye may understand my knowledge in the mystery of Christ )
text2: duþþe ei siggwandans mageiþ fraþjan frodein meinai in runai Xristaus

text: Which in other ages was not made known unto the sons of men , as it is now revealed unto his holy apostles and prophets by the Spirit ;
text2: þatei anþaraim aldim ni kunþ was sunum manne swaswe nu andhuliþ ist þaim weiham is apaustaulum jah praufetum in ahmin

text: That the Gentiles should be fellowheirs , and of the same body , and partakers of his promise in Christ by the gospel :
text2: wisan þiudos gaarbjans jah galeikans jah gadailans gahaitis is in Xristau Iesu þairh aiwaggeljon

text: Whereof I was made a minister , according to the gift of the grace of God given unto me by the effectual working of his power .
text2: þizozei warþ andbahts ik bi gibai anstais gudis þizai gibanon mis bi toja mahtais is

text: Unto me , who am less than the least of all saints , is this grace given , that I should preach among the Gentiles the unsearchable riches of Christ ;
text2: mis þamma undarleijin allaize þize weihane atgibana warþ ansts so in þiudom wailamerjan þo unfairlaistidon gabein Xristaus

text: And to make all men see what is the fellowship of the mystery , which from the beginning of the world hath been hid in God , who created all things by Jesus Christ :
text2: in guda þamma alla gaskapjandin

text: To the intent that now unto the principalities and powers in heavenly places might be known by the church the manifold wisdom of God ,
text2: ei kanniþ wesi nu reikjam jah waldufnjam in þaim himinakundam þairh aikklesjon so filufaiho handugei gudis

text: According to the eternal purpose which he purposed in Christ Jesus our Lord :
text2: bi muna aiwe þanei gatawida in Xristau Iesu fraujin unsaramma

text: In whom we have boldness and access with confidence by the faith of him .
text2: in þammei habam balþein jah atgagg in trauainai þairh galaubein is

text: Wherefore I desire that ye faint not at my tribulations for you , which is your glory .
text2: in þize bidja ni wairþaiþ usgrudjans in aglom meinaim faur izwis þatei ist wulþus izwar

text: For this cause I bow my knees unto the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: in þis biuga kniwa meina du attin fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus

text: Of whom the whole family in heaven and earth is named ,
text2: us þammei all fadreinis in himina jah ana airþai namnjada

text: That he would grant you , according to the riches of his glory , to be strengthened with might by his Spirit in the inner man ;
text2: ei gibai izwis bi gabein wulþaus seinis mahtai inswinþjan þairh ahman seinana in innuman mannan
column6: That he would grant you , according to the riches of his glory , to be strengthened with might by his Spirit in the inner man ;

text: That he would grant you , according to the riches of his glory , to be strengthened with might by his Spirit in the inner man ;
text2: ei gibai izwis bi gabein wulþaus seinis mahtai inswinþjan þairh ahman seinana in innuman mannan
column6: That he would grant you , according to the riches of his glory , to be strengthened with might by his Spirit in the inner man ;

text: That Christ may dwell in your hearts by faith ; that ye , being rooted and grounded in love ,
text2: bauan Xristu þairh galaubein in hairtam izwaraim

text: May be able to comprehend with all saints what is the breadth , and length , and depth , and height ;
text2: ei in frijaþwai gawaurhtai jah gasulidai mageiþ gafahan miþ allaim þaim weiham ƕa sijai braidei jal laggei jah hauhei jah diupei
column6: May be able to comprehend with all saints what is the breadth , and length , and depth , and height ;

text: May be able to comprehend with all saints what is the breadth , and length , and depth , and height ;
text2: ei in frijaþwai gawaurhtai jah gasulidai mageiþ gafahan miþ allaim þaim weiham ƕa sijai braidei jal laggei jah hauhei jah diupei
column6: May be able to comprehend with all saints what is the breadth , and length , and depth , and height ;

text: And to know the love of Christ , which passeth knowledge , that ye might be filled with all the fulness of God .
text2: kunnan þo ufarassau mikilon þis kunþjis frijaþwa Xristaus ei fulnaiþ in allai fullon gudis

text: Now unto him that is able to do exceeding abundantly above all that we ask or think , according to the power that worketh in us ,
text2: aþþan þamma mahteigin ufar all taujan maizo þau bidjam aiþþau fraþjam bi mahtai þizai waurkjandein in unsis

text: Unto him be glory in the church by Christ Jesus throughout all ages , world without end . Amen .
text2: imm uh wulþus in Xristau Iesu jah aikklesjon in allos aldins aiwe amen

text: I therefore , the prisoner of the Lord , beseech you that ye walk worthy of the vocation wherewith ye are called ,
text2: Bidja nu izwis ik bandja in fraujin wairþaba gaggan þizos laþonais þizaiei laþodai siuþ

text: With all lowliness and meekness , with longsuffering , forbearing one another in love ;
text2: miþ allai hauneinai jah qairrein miþ usbeisnai usþulandans izwis misso in frijaþwai

text: Endeavouring to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace .
text2: usdaudjandans fastan ainamundiþa ahmins in gabundjai gawairþeis

text: There is one body , and one Spirit , even as ye are called in one hope of your calling ;
text2: ain leik jah ains ahma swaswe atlaþodai sijuþ in aina wen laþonais izwaraizos

text: One Lord , one faith , one baptism ,
text2: ains frauja aina galaubeins aina daupeins

text: One God and Father of all , who is above all , and through all , and in you all .
text2: ains guþ jah atta allaize saei ufar allaim jah and allans jah in allaim uns

text: But unto every one of us is given grace according to the measure of the gift of Christ .
text2: iþ ainƕarjammeh unsara atgibana ist ansts bi mitaþ gibos Xristaus

text: Wherefore he saith , When he ascended up on high , he led captivity captive , and gave gifts unto men .
text2: in þizei qiþiþ ussteigands in hauhiþa ushanþ hunþ jah at - gaf uh gibos mannam

text: ( Now that he ascended , what is it but that he also descended first into the lower parts of the earth ?
text2: þat uþ þan usstaig ƕa ist niba þatei jah atstaig faurþis in undaristo airþos

text: He that descended is the same also that ascended up far above all heavens , that he might fill all things . )
text2: saei atstaig sa ist jah saei usstaig ufar allans himinans ei usfullidedi allata

text: And he gave some , apostles ; and some , prophets ; and some , evangelists ; and some , pastors and teachers ;
text2: jah silba gaf sumans apaustauluns sumanz uþ þan praufetuns sumans uþ þan aiwaggelistans sumans uþ þan hairdjans jah laisarjans
column6: And he gave some , apostles ; and some , prophets ; and some , evangelists ; and some , pastors and teachers ;

text: And he gave some , apostles ; and some , prophets ; and some , evangelists ; and some , pastors and teachers ;
text2: jah silba gaf sumans apaustauluns sumanz uþ þan praufetuns sumans uþ þan aiwaggelistans sumans uþ þan hairdjans jah laisarjans
column6: And he gave some , apostles ; and some , prophets ; and some , evangelists ; and some , pastors and teachers ;

text: For the perfecting of the saints , for the work of the ministry , for the edifying of the body of Christ :
text2: du ustauhtai weihaize du waurstwa andbahtjis du timreinai leikis Xristaus

text: Till we all come in the unity of the faith , and of the knowledge of the Son of God , unto a perfect man , unto the measure of the stature of the fulness of Christ :
text2: unte garinnaima allai in ainamundiþa galaubeinais jah ufkunþjis sunus gudis du waira fullamma in mitaþ wahstaus fullons Xristaus
column6: Till we all come in the unity of the faith , and of the knowledge of the Son of God , unto a perfect man , unto the measure of the stature of the fulness of Christ :

text: Till we all come in the unity of the faith , and of the knowledge of the Son of God , unto a perfect man , unto the measure of the stature of the fulness of Christ :
text2: unte garinnaima allai in ainamundiþa galaubeinais jah ufkunþjis sunus gudis du waira fullamma in mitaþ wahstaus fullons Xristaus
column6: Till we all come in the unity of the faith , and of the knowledge of the Son of God , unto a perfect man , unto the measure of the stature of the fulness of Christ :

text: That we henceforth be no more children , tossed to and fro , and carried about with every wind of doctrine , by the sleight of men , and cunning craftiness , whereby they lie in wait to deceive ;
text2: ei þanaseiþs ni sijaima niuklahai uswagidai jah uswalugidai winda ƕammeh laiseinais liutein manne in filudeisein du listeigon uswandjai airzeins

text: But speaking the truth in love , may grow up into him in all things , which is the head , even Christ :
text2: iþ sunja taujandans in frijaþwai wahsjaima in ina þo alla ize ist haubiþ Xristus

text: From whom the whole body fitly joined together and compacted by that which every joint supplieth , according to the effectual working in the measure of every part , maketh increase of the body unto the edifying of itself in love .
text2: us þammei all leik gagatiloþ jah gagahaftiþ þairh allos gawissins andstaldis bi waurstwa in mitaþ ana ainƕarjoh fero uswahst leikis taujiþ du timreinai seinai in frijaþwai

text: This I say therefore , and testify in the Lord , that ye henceforth walk not as other Gentiles walk , in the vanity of their mind ,
text2: þata nu qiþa jah weitwodja in fraujin ei þanaseiþs ni gaggaiþ swaswe jah anþaros þiudos gaggand in uswissja hugis seinis

text: Having the understanding darkened , being alienated from the life of God through the ignorance that is in them , because of the blindness of their heart :
text2: riqizeinai gahugdai wisandans framaþjai libainais gudis in unwitjis þis wisandins in im in daubiþos hairtane seinaize

text: Who being past feeling have given themselves over unto lasciviousness , to work all uncleanness with greediness .
text2: þaiei uswenans waurþanai sik silbans atgebun aglaitein in waurstwein unhrainiþos allaizos in faihufrikein

text: But ye have not so learned Christ ;
text2: iþ jus ni swa ganemuþ Xristu

text: If so be that ye have heard him , and have been taught by him , as the truth is in Jesus :
text2: jabai sweþauh ina hausideduþ jah in imma uslaisidai sijuþ swaswe ist sunja in Iesu

text: That ye put off concerning the former conversation the old man , which is corrupt according to the deceitful lusts ;
text2: ei aflagjaiþ jus bi frumin usmeta þana fairnjan mannan þana riurjan bi lustum afmarzeinais

text: And be renewed in the spirit of your mind ;
text2: an - niujaiþ uþ þan ahmin fraþjis izwaris

text: And that ye put on the new man , which after God is created in righteousness and true holiness .
text2: jag gahamoþ þamma niujin mann þamma bi guda gaskapanin in garaihtein jah weihiþai sunjos

text: Wherefore putting away lying , speak every man truth with his neighbour : for we are members one of another .
text2: in þizei aflagjandans liugn rodjaiþ sunja ƕarjizuh miþ neƕundjin seinamma unte sijum anþar anþaris liþus

text: Be ye angry , and sin not : let not the sun go down upon your wrath :
text2: þwairhai þ þan sijaiþ jah ni frawaurkjaiþ sunno ni dissigqai ana þwairhein izwara

text: Neither give place to the devil .
text2: ni gibiþ staþ unhulþin

text: Let him that stole steal no more : but rather let him labour , working with his hands the thing which is good , that he may have to give to him that needeth .
text2: saei hlefi þanaseiþs ni hlifai iþ mais arbaidjai waurkjands swesaim handum þiuþ ei habai dailjan þaurbandin

text: Let no corrupt communication proceed out of your mouth , but that which is good to the use of edifying , that it may minister grace unto the hearers .
text2: ainhun waurde ubilaize us munþa izwaramma ni usgaggai ak þatei goþ sijai du timreinai galaubeinais ei gibai anst hausjandam

text: And grieve not the holy Spirit of God , whereby ye are sealed unto the day of redemption .
text2: jah ni gaurjaiþ þana weihan ahman gudis in þammei gasiglidai sijuþ in daga uslauseinais

text: Let all bitterness , and wrath , and anger , and clamour , and evil speaking , be put away from you , with all malice :
text2: alla baitrei jah hatis jah þwairhei jah hrops jah wajamereins afwairpaidau af izwis miþ allai unselein

text: And be ye kind one to another , tenderhearted , forgiving one another , even as God for Christ ' s sake hath forgiven you .
text2: wairþaid uh miþ izwis misso seljai armahairtai fragibandans izwis misso swaswe guþ in Xristau fragaf izwis

text: Be ye therefore followers of God , as dear children ;
text2: Wairþaiþ nu galeikondans guda swe barna liuba

text: And walk in love , as Christ also hath loved us , and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savour .
text2: jah gaggaiþ in frijaþwai swaswe jah Xristus frijoda uns jah atgaf sik silban faur uns hunsl jah sauþ guda du daunai woþjai

text: But fornication , and all uncleanness , or covetousness , let it not be once named among you , as becometh saints ;
text2: aþþan horinassus jah allos unhrainiþos aiþþau faihufrikei nih namnjaidau

text: Neither filthiness , nor foolish talking , nor jesting , which are not convenient : but rather giving of thanks .
text2: aiþþau aglaitiwaurdei aiþþau dwalawaurdei aiþþau saldra þoei du þaurftai ni fairrinnand ak mais awiliuda

text: For this ye know , that no whoremonger , nor unclean person , nor covetous man , who is an idolater , hath any inheritance in the kingdom of Christ and of God .
text2: þata auk witeiþ kunnandans þatei ƕazuh hors aiþþau unhrains aiþþau faihufriks þatei ist galiugagude skalkinassaus ni habaiþ arbi in þiudangardjai Xristaus jah gudis

text: Let no man deceive you with vain words : for because of these things cometh the wrath of God upon the children of disobedience .
text2: ni manna izwis usluto lausaim waurdam þairh þoei qimiþ hatis gudis ana sunum ungalaubeinais

text: Be not ye therefore partakers with them .
text2: ni wairþaiþ nu gadailans im

text: For ye were sometimes darkness , but now are ye light in the Lord : walk as children of light :
text2: wesuþ auk suman riqiz iþ nu liuhaþ in fraujin swe barna liuhadis gaggaiþ

text: ( For the fruit of the Spirit is in all goodness and righteousness and truth ; )
text2: aþþan akran liuhadis ist in allai selein jah garaihtein jah sunjai

text: Proving what is acceptable unto the Lord .
text2: gakiusandans þatei sijai waila galeikaiþ fraujin

text: And have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness , but rather reprove them .
text2: jah ni gamainjaiþ waurstwam riqizis

text: Wherefore be ye not unwise , but understanding what the will of the Lord is .
text2: duþþe ni wairþaiþ unfrodai ak fraþjandans ƕa sijai wilja fraujins

text: And be not drunk with wine , wherein is excess ; but be filled with the Spirit ;
text2: jah ni anadrigkaiþ izwis weina in þammei ist usstiurei ak fullnaiþ in ahmin

text: Speaking to yourselves in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs , singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord ;
text2: rodjandans izwis in psalmom jah hazeinim jah saggwim ahmeinaim siggwandans in hairtam izwaraim fraujin

text: Giving thanks always for all things unto God and the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ ;
text2: awiliudondans sinteino fram allaim in namin fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus attin jah guda

text: Submitting yourselves one to another in the fear of God .
text2: ufhausjandans izwis misso in agisa Xristaus

text: Wives , submit yourselves unto your own husbands , as unto the Lord .
text2: qenes seinaim abnam ufhausjaina swaswe fraujin

text: For the husband is the head of the wife , even as Christ is the head of the church : and he is the saviour of the body .
text2: unte wair ist haubiþ qenais swaswe jah Xristus haubiþ aikklesjons jah is ist nasjands leikis

text: Therefore as the church is subject unto Christ , so let the wives be to their own husbands in every thing .
text2: akei swaswe aikklesjo ufhauseiþ Xristu swah qenes abnam seinaim in allamma

text: Husbands , love your wives , even as Christ also loved the church , and gave himself for it ;
text2: jus wairos frijoþ qenins izwaros swaswe jah Xristus frijoda aikklesjon jah sik silban atgaf faur þo

text: That he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word ,
text2: ei þo gaweihaidedi gahrainjands þwahla watins in waurda

text: That he might present it to himself a glorious church , not having spot , or wrinkle , or any such thing ; but that it should be holy and without blemish .
text2: ei ustauhi silba sis wulþaga aikklesjon ni habandein wamme aiþþau maile aiþþau ƕa swaleikaize ak ei sijai weiha jah unwamma

text: So ought men to love their wives as their own bodies . He that loveth his wife loveth himself .
text2: swa jah wairos skulun frijon seinos qenins swe leika seina saei seina qen frijoþ sik silban frijoþ

text: For no man ever yet hated his own flesh ; but nourisheth and cherisheth it , even as the Lord the church :
text2: ni auk manna ƕanhun sein leik fijaida ak fodeiþ ita jah warmeiþ swaswe jah Xristus aikklesjon

text: Knowing that whatsoever good thing any man doeth , the same shall he receive of the Lord , whether he be bond or free .
text2: taujiþ þiuþis þata ganimiþ at fraujin jaþþe skalks jaþþe freis

text: And , ye masters , do the same things unto them , forbearing threatening : knowing that your Master also is in heaven ; neither is there respect of persons with him .
text2: fraletandans im ƕotos witandans þatei im jah izwis sama frauja ist in himinam jah wiljahalþei nist at imma

text: Finally , my brethren , be strong in the Lord , and in the power of his might .
text2: þata nu anþar broþrjus meinai inswinþjaiþ izwis in fraujin jah in mahtai swinþeins is

text: Put on the whole armour of God , that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil .
text2: gahamoþ izwis sarwam gudis ei mageiþ standan wiþra listins diabulaus

text: For we wrestle not against flesh and blood , but against principalities , against powers , against the rulers of the darkness of this world , against spiritual wickedness in high places .
text2: unte nist izwis brakja wiþra leik jah bloþ ak wiþra reikja jah waldufnja wiþra þans fairƕu habandans riqizis þis wiþra þo ahmeinona unseleins in þaim himinakundam

text: Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God , that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day , and having done all , to stand .
text2: duþþe nimiþ sarwa gudis ei mageiþ andstandan in þamma daga ubilin jah in allamma uswaurkjandans standan

text: Stand therefore , having your loins girt about with truth , and having on the breastplate of righteousness ;
text2: standaiþ nu ufgaurdanai hupins izwarans sunjai jag gapaidodai brunjon garaihteins

text: And your feet shod with the preparation of the gospel of peace ;
text2: jag gaskohai fotum in manwiþai aiwaggeljons gawairþjis

text: Above all , taking the shield of faith , wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked .
text2: ufar all andnimandans skildu galaubeinais þammei maguþ allos arƕaznos þis unseljins funiskos afƕapjan

text: And take the helmet of salvation , and the sword of the Spirit , which is the word of God :
text2: jah hilm naseinais nimaiþ jah meki ahmins þatei ist waurd gudis

text: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit , and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints ;
text2: þairh allos aihtronins jah bidos aihtrondans in alla mela in ahmin jah du þamma wakandans sinteino usdaudein jah bidom fram allaim þaim weiham

text: And for me , that utterance may be given unto me , that I may open my mouth boldly , to make known the mystery of the gospel ,
text2: jah fram mis ei mis gibaidau

text: For which I am an ambassador in bonds : that therein I may speak boldly , as I ought to speak .
text2: faur þoei airino in kunawidom ei in izai gadaursjau swe skuljau rodjan

text: But that ye also may know my affairs , and how I do , Tychicus , a beloved brother and faithful minister in the Lord , shall make known to you all things :
text2: aþþan ei jah jus witeiþ ƕa bi mik ist ƕa ik tauja kanneiþ izwis allata Twkeikus sa liuba broþar jah triggwa andbahts in fraujin

text: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose , that ye might know our affairs , and that he might comfort your hearts .
text2: þanei insandida du izwis duþþe ei kunneiþ ƕa bi mik ist jah gaþrafstjai hairtona izwara

text: Peace be to the brethren , and love with faith , from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: gawairþi broþrum jah friaþwa miþ galaubeinai fram guda attin jah fraujin Iesu Xristau

text: Grace be with all them that love our Lord Jesus Christ in sincerity . Amen .
text2: ansts miþ allaim þaiei frijond fraujan unsarana Iesu Xristu in unriurein amen

text: And many of the brethren in the Lord , waxing confident by my bonds , are much more bold to speak the word without fear .
text2: managistans broþre in fraujin gatrauandans bandjom meinaim mais gadaursan unagandans waurd gudis rodjan

text: Some indeed preach Christ even of envy and strife ; and some also of good will :
text2: sumai raihtis jah in neiþis jah haifstais sumai þan in godis wiljins Xristu merjand

text: The one preach Christ of contention , not sincerely , supposing to add affliction to my bonds :
text2: sumai þan us friaþwai witandans þatei du sunjonai aiwaggeljons gasatiþs im

text: But the other of love , knowing that I am set for the defence of the gospel .
text2: iþ þaiei us haifstai Xristu merjand ni swiknaba munandans sik aglons urraisjan bandjom meinaim

text: What then ? notwithstanding , every way , whether in pretence , or in truth , Christ is preached ; and I therein do rejoice , yea , and will rejoice .
text2: ƕa auk þandei allaim haidum jaþþe inilon jaþþe sunjai Xristus merjada jah in þamma fagino akei jah faginon duginna

text: For I know that this shall turn to my salvation through your prayer , and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ ,
text2: unte wait ei þata mis gagaggiþ du ganistai þairh izwara bida jah andstald ahmins Xristaus Iesuis

text: According to my earnest expectation and my hope , that in nothing I shall be ashamed , but that with all boldness , as always , so now also Christ shall be magnified in my body , whether it be by life , or by death .
text2: bi usbeisnai jah wenai meinaim unte ni in waihtai gaaiwiskoþs wairþa ak in allai trauainai swe sinteino jah nu mikiljada Xristus in leika meinamma jaþþe þairh libain jaþþe þairh dauþu

text: For to me to live is Christ , and to die is gain .
text2: aþþan mis liban Xristus ist jah gaswiltan gawaurki

text: But if I live in the flesh , this is the fruit of my labour : yet what I shall choose I wot not .
text2: iþ jabai liban in leika þata mis akran waurstwis ist jah ƕaþar waljau ni kann

text: For I am in a strait betwixt two , having a desire to depart , and to be with Christ ; which is far better :
text2: aþþan dishabaiþs im us þaim twaim þanuh lustu habands andletnan jah miþ Xristau wisan und filu mais batizo ist

text: Nevertheless to abide in the flesh is more needful for you .
text2: aþþan du wisan in leika þaurftozo in izwara

text: And having this confidence , I know that I shall abide and continue with you all for your furtherance and joy of faith ;
text2: jah þata triggwaba wait þatei wisa jah þairhwisa at allaim izwis du izwarai framgahtai jah fahedai galaubeinais izwaraizos

text: That your rejoicing may be more abundant in Jesus Christ for me by my coming to you again .
text2: ei ƕoftuli izwara biauknai in Xristau Iesu in mis þairh meinana qum aftra du izwis

text: Only let your conversation be as it becometh the gospel of Christ : that whether I come and see you , or else be absent , I may hear of your affairs , that ye stand fast in one spirit , with one mind striving together for the faith of the gospel ;
text2: ƕeh wairþaba aiwaggeljons Xristaus usmitaiþ ei jaþþe qimau jah gasaiƕau izwis jaþþe aljaþro gahausjau bi izwis þatei standiþ in ainamma ahmin ainai saiwalai samana arbaidjandans galaubeinai aiwaggeljons

text: And in nothing terrified by your adversaries : which is to them an evident token of perdition , but to you of salvation , and that of God .
text2: jah ni in waihtai afagidai fram þaim andastaþjam þatei ist im ustaikneins fralustais iþ izwis ganistais jah þata fram guda

text: For unto you it is given in the behalf of Christ , not only to believe on him , but also to suffer for his sake ;
text2: izwis fragiban ist faur Xristu ni þatainei du imma galaubjan ak jah þata faur ina winnan

text: Having the same conflict which ye saw in me , and now hear to be in me .
text2: þo samon haifst habandans þoei gasaiƕiþ in mis jah nu hauseiþ in mis

text: If there be therefore any consolation in Christ , if any comfort of love , if any fellowship of the Spirit , if any bowels and mercies ,
text2: Jabai ƕo nu gaþrafsteino in Xristau jabai ƕo gaþlaihte friaþwos jabai ƕo gamainduþe ahmins jabai ƕo mildiþo jah gableiþeino
column6: If there be therefore any consolation in Christ , if any comfort of love , if any fellowship of the Spirit , if any bowels and mercies ,
column10: If there be therefore any consolation in Christ , if any comfort of love , if any fellowship of the Spirit , if any bowels and mercies ,
