text: Fulfil ye my joy , that ye be likeminded , having the same love , being of one accord , of one mind .
text2: usfulleiþ meina fahed ei þata samo hugjaiþ þo samon friaþwa habandans samasaiwalai samafraþjai

text: Let nothing be done through strife or vainglory ; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves .
text2: ni waiht bi haifstai aiþþau lausai hauheinai ak in allai hauneinai gahugdais anþar anþarana munands sis auhuman
column6: Let nothing be done through strife or vainglory ; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves .

text: Let nothing be done through strife or vainglory ; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves .
text2: ni waiht bi haifstai aiþþau lausai hauheinai ak in allai hauneinai gahugdais anþar anþarana munands sis auhuman
column6: Let nothing be done through strife or vainglory ; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves .

text: Look not every man on his own things , but every man also on the things of others .
text2: ni þo seina ƕarjizuh mitondans ak jah þo anþaraize ƕarjizuh

text: Let this mind be in you , which was also in Christ Jesus :
text2: þata auk fraþjaidau in izwis þatei jah in Xristau Iesu
column6: Let this mind be in you , which was also in Christ Jesus :

text: Let this mind be in you , which was also in Christ Jesus :
text2: þata auk fraþjaidau in izwis þatei jah in Xristau Iesu
column6: Let this mind be in you , which was also in Christ Jesus :

text: Who , being in the form of God , thought it not robbery to be equal with God :
text2: saei in gudaskaunein wisands ni wulwa rahnida wisan sik galeiko guda

text: But made himself of no reputation , and took upon him the form of a servant , and was made in the likeness of men :
text2: ak sik silban uslausida wlit skalkis nimands in galeikja manne waurþans

text: And being found in fashion as a man , he humbled himself , and became obedient unto death , even the death of the cross .
text2: jah manaulja bigitans swe manna
column6: And being found in fashion as a man , he humbled himself , and became obedient unto death , even the death of the cross .
column8: gahaunida sik silban waurþans ufhausjands attin und

text: And being found in fashion as a man , he humbled himself , and became obedient unto death , even the death of the cross .

column6: And being found in fashion as a man , he humbled himself , and became obedient unto death , even the death of the cross .

text: But ye know the proof of him , that , as a son with the father , he hath served with me in the gospel .
text2: þatei swe attin barn miþskalkinoda mis in aiwaggeljon

text: Him therefore I hope to send presently , so soon as I shall see how it will go with me .
text2: þanuh nu wenja sandjan biþe gasaiƕa ƕa bi mik ist suns

text: But I trust in the Lord that I also myself shall come shortly .
text2: aþþan gatraua in fraujin þammei jah silba sprauto qima

text: Yet I supposed it necessary to send to you Epaphroditus , my brother , and companion in labour , and fellowsoldier , but your messenger , and he that ministered to my wants .
text2: aþþan þarb munda Aipafraudeitu broþar jah gawaurstwan jah gahlaiban meinana iþ izwarana apaustulu jah andbaht þaurftais meinaizos sandjan du izwis

text: For he longed after you all , and was full of heaviness , because that ye had heard that he had been sick .
text2: in þize hausideduþ ina siukan

text: For indeed he was sick nigh unto death : but God had mercy on him ; and not on him only , but on me also , lest I should have sorrow upon sorrow .
text2: jah auk siuks was neƕa dauþau akei guþ ina gaarmaida aþþan ni þatainei ina ak jah mik ei gaurein ana gaurein ni habau

text: I sent him therefore the more carefully , that , when ye see him again , ye may rejoice , and that I may be the less sorrowful .
text2: sniumundos nu insandida ina ei gasaiƕandans ina aftra faginoþ jah ik hlasoza sijau

text: Receive him therefore in the Lord with all gladness ; and hold such in reputation :
text2: andnimaiþ nu ina in fraujin miþ allai fahedai jah þans swaleikans swerans habaiþ

text: Because for the work of Christ he was nigh unto death , not regarding his life , to supply your lack of service toward me .
text2: unte in waurstwis Xristaus und dauþu atneƕida ufarmunnonds saiwalai seinai ei usfullidedi izwar gaidw bi mein andbahti

text: Finally , my brethren , rejoice in the Lord . To write the same things to you , to me indeed is not grievous , but for you it is safe .
text2: þata anþar broþrjus meinai faginoþ in fraujin þo samona izwis meljan mis sweþauh ni latei iþ izwis þwastiþa

text: Beware of dogs , beware of evil workers , beware of the concision .
text2: saiƕiþ þans hundans saiƕiþ þans ubilans waurstwjans saiƕiþ þo gamaitanon

text: For we are the circumcision , which worship God in the spirit , and rejoice in Christ Jesus , and have no confidence in the flesh .
text2: aþþan weis sium bimait weis ahmin guda skalkinondans jah ƕopandans in Xristau Iesu jan ni in leika gatrauam
column6: For we are the circumcision , which worship God in the spirit , and rejoice in Christ Jesus , and have no confidence in the flesh .

text: For we are the circumcision , which worship God in the spirit , and rejoice in Christ Jesus , and have no confidence in the flesh .
text2: aþþan weis sium bimait weis ahmin guda skalkinondans jah ƕopandans in Xristau Iesu jan ni in leika gatrauam
column6: For we are the circumcision , which worship God in the spirit , and rejoice in Christ Jesus , and have no confidence in the flesh .

text: Though I might also have confidence in the flesh . If any other man thinketh that he hath whereof he might trust in the flesh , I more :
text2: jah þan ik habands trauain jah in leika
column6: Though I might also have confidence in the flesh . If any other man thinketh that he hath whereof he might trust in the flesh , I more :
column8: jabai ƕas anþar þugkeiþ trauan in leika ik mais

text: Though I might also have confidence in the flesh . If any other man thinketh that he hath whereof he might trust in the flesh , I more :

column6: Though I might also have confidence in the flesh . If any other man thinketh that he hath whereof he might trust in the flesh , I more :

text: Circumcised the eighth day , of the stock of Israel , of the tribe of Benjamin , an Hebrew of the Hebrews ; as touching the law , a Pharisee ;
text2: bimait ahtaudogs us knodai Israelis kunjis Bainiameinis Haibraius us Haibraium bi witoda Fareisaius

text: Concerning zeal , persecuting the church ; touching the righteousness which is in the law , blameless .
text2: bi aljana wrakjands aikklesjon bi garaihtein þizai sei in witoda ist wisands usfairina

text: But what things were gain to me , those I counted loss for Christ .
text2: akei þatei was mis gawaurki þatuh rahnida in Xristaus sleiþa wisan

text: Yea doubtless , and I count all things but loss for the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord : for whom I have suffered the loss of all things , and do count them but dung , that I may win Christ ,
text2: aþþan sweþauh all domja sleiþa wisan in ufarassaus kunþjis Xristaus Iesuis fraujins meinis in þizei allamma gasleiþiþs im jah domja smarnos wisan allata ei Xristau du gawaurkja habau

text: And be found in him , not having mine own righteousness , which is of the law , but that which is through the faith of Christ , the righteousness which is of God by faith :
text2: jah bigitaidau in imma ni habands meina garaihtein þo us witoda akei þo þairh galaubein Xristaus Iesuis sei us guda ist garaihtei ana galaubeinai

text: That I may know him , and the power of his resurrection , and the fellowship of his sufferings , being made conformable unto his death ;
text2: du kunnan ina jah maht usstassais is jah gamainduþ þulaine is miþkauriþs was dauþau is

text: If by any means I might attain unto the resurrection of the dead .
text2: ei ƕaiwa gaqimau in usstassai us dauþaim

text: Not as though I had already attained , either were already perfect : but I follow after , if that I may apprehend that for which also I am apprehended of Christ Jesus .
text2: ni þatei ju andnemjau aiþþau ju garaihts gadomiþs sijau aþþan afargagga ei gafahau in þammei gafahans warþ fram Xristau

text: Brethren , I count not myself to have apprehended : but this one thing I do , forgetting those things which are behind , and reaching forth unto those things which are before ,
text2: broþrjus ik mik silban ni nauh man gafahan

text: I press toward the mark for the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus .
text2: aþþan ain sweþauh þaim aftra ufarmunnonds iþ du þaim þoei faura sind mik ufþanjands bi mundrein afargagga afar sigislauna þizos iupa laþonais gudis in Xristau Iesu

text: Let us therefore , as many as be perfect , be thus minded : and if in any thing ye be otherwise minded , God shall reveal even this unto you .
text2: swa managai nu swe sijaima fullawitans þata hugjaima jah jabai ƕa aljaleikos hugjiþ jah þata izwis guþ andhuljiþ

text: Nevertheless , whereto we have already attained , let us walk by the same rule , let us mind the same thing .
text2: aþþan sweþauh du þammei gasnewum ei samo hugjaima samon gaggan garaideinai

text: Brethren , be followers together of me , and mark them which walk so as ye have us for an ensample .
text2: miþgaleikondans meinai wairþaiþ broþrjus jam mundoþ izwis þans swa gaggandans swaswe habaiþ frisaht unsis

text: ( For many walk , of whom I have told you often , and now tell you even weeping , that they are the enemies of the cross of Christ :
text2: unte managai gaggand þanzei ufta qaþ izwis iþ nu jag gretands qiþa þans fijands galgins Xristaus

text: Whose end is destruction , whose God is their belly , and whose glory is in their shame , who mind earthly things . )
text2: þizeiei andeis wairþiþ fralusts þizeiei guþ wamba ist jah wulþaus in skandai ize þaiei airþeinaim fraþjand

text: For our conversation is in heaven ; from whence also we look for the Saviour , the Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: iþ unsara bauains in himinam ist þaþroei jah nasjand usbeidam fraujan Iesu Xristu

text: Who shall change our vile body , that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body , according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself .
text2: saei inmaideiþ leika hauneinais unsaraizos du ibnaskaunjamma leika wulþaus seinis bi waurstwa unte mag jah ufhnaiwjan sis alla

text: Therefore , my brethren dearly beloved and longed for , my joy and crown , so stand fast in the Lord , my dearly beloved .
text2: Swaei nu broþrjus meinai liubans jah lustusamans faheþs jah waips meins swa standaiþ in fraujin

text: I beseech Euodias , and beseech Syntyche , that they be of the same mind in the Lord .
text2: Aiodian bidja jas Swntwkein bidja þata samo fraþjan in fraujin

text: And I intreat thee also , true yokefellow , help those women which laboured with me in the gospel , with Clement also , and with other my fellowlabourers , whose names are in the book of life .
text2: jai jah þuk waliso bidja gajuko niþais þos þozei miþarbaididedun mis in aiwaggeljon miþ Klaimaintau jah anþaraim gawaurstwam meinaim þizeei namna sind in bokom libainais

text: Rejoice in the Lord alway : and again I say , Rejoice .
text2: nunu nu faginoþ in fraujin sinteino aftra qiþa faginoþ

text: Let your moderation be known unto all men . The Lord is at hand .
text2: anawiljei izwara kunþa sijai allaim mannam frauja neƕa ist

text: Be careful for nothing ; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God .
text2: ni waihtai maurnaiþ ak in allai bidai jah aihtronai miþ awiliudam bidos izwaros kunþos sijaina

text: And the peace of God , which passeth all understanding , shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus .
text2: jah gawairþi gudis þatei ufar ist all ahane fastaiþ hairtona jah leika izwara in Xristau Iesu

text: Finally , brethren , whatsoever things are true , whatsoever things are honest , whatsoever things are just , whatsoever things are pure , whatsoever things are lovely , whatsoever things are of good report ; if there be any virtue , and if there be any praise , think on these things .
text2: þata anþar broþrjus þisƕah þatei ist sunjein þisƕah þatei gariud þisƕah þatei garaiht þisƕah þatei weih þisƕah þatei liubaleik þisƕah þatei wailameri jabai ƕo godeino jabai ƕo hazeino þata mitoþ

text: Those things , which ye have both learned , and received , and heard , and seen in me , do : and the God of peace shall be with you .
text2: þatei jah galaisideduþ izwis jah ganemuþ jah gahausideduþ jah gaseƕuþ in mis þata taujaiþ jah guþ gawairþeis sijai miþ izwis

text: But I rejoiced in the Lord greatly , that now at the last your care of me hath flourished again ; wherein ye were also careful , but ye lacked opportunity .
text2: aþþan faginoda in fraujin mikilaba unte ju ƕan gaþaihuþ du faur mik fraþjan ana þammei jah froþuþ aþþan analatidai waurþuþ

text: Not that I speak in respect of want : for I have learned , in whatsoever state I am , therewith to be content .
text2: ni þatei bi þarbai qiþau unte ik galaisida mik in þaimei im ganohiþs wisan

text: I know both how to be abased , and I know how to abound : every where and in all things I am instructed both to be full and to be hungry , both to abound and to suffer need .
text2: lais jah haunjan mik lais jah ufarassu haban in allamma jah in allaim usþroþiþs im jah sads wairþan jah gredags jah ufarassau haban jah þarbos þulan

text: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me .
text2: all mag in þamma inswinþjandin mik Xristau

text: Notwithstanding ye have well done , that ye did communicate with my affliction .
text2: aþþan sweþauh waila gatawideduþ gamainja briggandans meina aglon

text: Now ye Philippians know also , that in the beginning of the gospel , when I departed from Macedonia , no church communicated with me as concerning giving and receiving , but ye only .
text2: aþþan wituþ jah jus Filippisius þatei in anastodeinai aiwaggeljons þan usiddja af Makidonai ni ainohun aikklesjono mis gamainida in raþjon gibos jah andanemis alja jus ainai

text: For even in Thessalonica ye sent once and again unto my necessity .
text2: unte jah in Þaissalauneikai jah ainamma sinþa jah twaim andawizn mis insandideduþ

text: Not because I desire a gift : but I desire fruit that may abound to your account .
text2: ni þatei gasokjau giba ak gasokja akran

text: Which is come unto you , as it is in all the world ; and bringeth forth fruit , as it doth also in you , since the day ye heard of it , and knew the grace of God in truth :
text2: in sunjai

text: As ye also learned of Epaphras our dear fellowservant , who is for you a faithful minister of Christ ;
text2: swaswe ganemuþ at Aipafrin þamma liubin gaskalkja unsaramma saei ist triggws faur izwis andbahts Xristaus Iesuis

text: Who also declared unto us your love in the Spirit .
text2: saei jah gakannida uns izwara friaþwa in ahmin

text: For this cause we also , since the day we heard it , do not cease to pray for you , and to desire that ye might be filled with the knowledge of his will in all wisdom and spiritual understanding ;
text2: duþþe jah weis fram þamma daga ei hausidedum ni ƕeilaidedum faur izwis bidjandans jah aihtrondans ei fullnaiþ kunþjis wiljins is in allai handugein jah frodein ahmeinai

text: That ye might walk worthy of the Lord unto all pleasing , being fruitful in every good work , and increasing in the knowledge of God ;
text2: wairþaba fraujins in allamma þatei galeikai in allamma waurstwe godaize akran bairandans jah wahsjandans in ufkunþja gudis

text: Strengthened with all might , according to his glorious power , unto all patience and longsuffering with joyfulness ;
text2: in allai mahtai gaswinþidai bi mahtai wulþaus is in allai usþulainai jah usbeisnai miþ fahedai

text: Giving thanks unto the Father , which hath made us meet to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in light :
text2: awiliudondans attin saei laþoda izwis du dailai hlautis weihaize in liuhada

text: Who hath delivered us from the power of darkness , and hath translated us into the kingdom of his dear Son :
text2: saei galausida izwis us waldufnja riqizis jah atnam in þiudangardja sunus friaþwos seinaizos

text: In whom we have redemption through his blood , even the forgiveness of sins :
text2: in þammei habam faurbauht fralet frawaurhte

text: Who is the image of the invisible God , the firstborn of every creature :
text2: saei ist frisahts gudis ungasaiƕanis frumabaur allaizos gaskaftais

text: For by him were all things created , that are in heaven , and that are in earth , visible and invisible , whether they be thrones , or dominions , or principalities , or powers : all things were created by him , and for him :

text: And he is before all things , and by him all things consist .
text2: jah is ist faura allaim jah alla in imma ussatida sind

text: And he is the head of the body , the church : who is the beginning , the firstborn from the dead ; that in all things he might have the preeminence .
text2: jah is ist haubiþ leikis aikklesjons saei ist anastodeins frumabaur us dauþaim ei sijai in allaim is frumadein habands

text: For it pleased the Father that in him should all fulness dwell ;
text2: unte in imma galeikaida alla fullon bauan

text: And , having made peace through the blood of his cross , by him to reconcile all things unto himself ; by him , I say , whether they be things in earth , or things in heaven .
text2: jah þairh ina gafriþon alla in imma gawairþi taujands þairh bloþ galgins is þairh ina jaþþe þo ana airþai jaþþe þo ana himinam

text: And you , that were sometime alienated and enemies in your mind by wicked works , yet now hath he reconciled
text2: jah izwis simle wisandans framaþidans jah fijands gahugdai in waurstwam ubilaim iþ nu gafriþodai
column6: And you , that were sometime alienated and enemies in your mind by wicked works , yet now hath he reconciled

text: And you , that were sometime alienated and enemies in your mind by wicked works , yet now hath he reconciled
text2: jah izwis simle wisandans framaþidans jah fijands gahugdai in waurstwam ubilaim iþ nu gafriþodai
column6: And you , that were sometime alienated and enemies in your mind by wicked works , yet now hath he reconciled

text: In the body of his flesh through death , to present you holy and unblameable and unreproveable in his sight :
text2: in leika mammons is þairh dauþu du atsatjan izwis weihans jah unwammans jah usfairinans faura imma

text: If ye continue in the faith grounded and settled , and be not moved away from the hope of the gospel , which ye have heard , and which was preached to every creature which is under heaven ; whereof I Paul am made a minister ;
text2: jabai sweþauh þairhwisiþ in galaubeinai gaþwastidai jah gatulgidai jah ni afwagidai af wenai aiwaggeljons þoei hausideduþ sei merida ist in alla gaskaft þo uf himina þizozei warþ ik Pawlus andbahts

text: Who now rejoice in my sufferings for you , and fill up that which is behind of the afflictions of Christ in my flesh for his body ' s sake , which is the church :
text2: nu fagino in þaimei winna faur izwis jah usfullja gaidwa aglono Xristaus in leika meinamma faur leik is þatei ist aikklesjo

text: Whereof I am made a minister , according to the dispensation of God which is given to me for you , to fulfil the word of God ;
text2: þizozei warþ ik andbahts bi ragina gudis þatei giban ist mis in izwis du usfulljan waurd gudis

text: Even the mystery which hath been hid from ages and from generations , but now is made manifest to his saints :
text2: runa sei gafulgina was fram aiwam jah fram aldim iþ nu gaswikunþida warþ þaim weiham is

text: To whom God would make known what is the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles ; which is Christ in you , the hope of glory :
text2: þaimei wilda guþ gakannjan gabein wulþaus þizos runos in þiudom þatei ist Xristus in izwis wens wulþaus

text: Whom we preach , warning every man , and teaching every man in all wisdom ; that we may present every man perfect in Christ Jesus :
text2: þanei weis gateiham talzjandans all manne jah laisjandans all manne in allai handugein ei atsatjaima all manne fullawitan in Xristau Iesu

text: Whereunto I also labour , striving according to his working , which worketh in me mightily .
text2: du þammei arbaidja usdaudjands bi waurstwa sei inna uswaurkeiþ in mis in mahtai

text: In whom also ye are circumcised with the circumcision made without hands , in putting off the body of the sins of the flesh by the circumcision of Christ :
text2: frawaurhte leikis in bimaita Xristaus

text: Buried with him in baptism , wherein also ye are risen with him through the faith of the operation of God , who hath raised him from the dead .
text2: miþ ganawistrodai imma in daupeinai in þizaiei jah miþurrisuþ þairh galaubein waurstwis gudis saei urraisida ina us dauþaim

text: And you , being dead in your sins and the uncircumcision of your flesh , hath he quickened together with him , having forgiven you all trespasses ;
text2: jah izwis dauþans wisandans missadedim jah unbimaita leikis izwaris miþgaqiwida miþ imma fragibands uns allos missadedins

text: Blotting out the handwriting of ordinances that was against us , which was contrary to us , and took it out of the way , nailing it to his cross ;
text2: afswairbands þos ana uns wadjabokos raginam seinaim þatei was andaneiþo uns jah þata usnam us midumai ganagljands ita du galgin

text: And having spoiled principalities and powers , he made a shew of them openly , triumphing over them in it .
text2: andhamonds sik leika reikja jah waldufnja gatarhida balþaba gablauþjands þo bairhtaba in sis

text: Let no man therefore judge you in meat , or in drink , or in respect of an holyday , or of the new moon , or of the sabbath days :
text2: ni manna nu izwis bidomjai in mata aiþþau in draggka aiþþau in dailai dagis dulþais aiþþau fulliþe aiþþau sabbatum

text: Which are a shadow of things to come ; but the body is of Christ .
text2: þatei ist skadus þize anawairþane iþ leik Xristaus

text: Let no man beguile you of your reward in a voluntary humility and worshipping of angels , intruding into those things which he hath not seen , vainly puffed up by his fleshly mind ,
text2: ni ƕashun izwis gajiukai wiljands in hauneinai jah blotinassau aggile þatei ni saƕ ushafjands sik sware ufblesans fram fraþja leikis seinis

text: And not holding the Head , from which all the body by joints and bands having nourishment ministered , and knit together , increaseth with the increase of God .

text: Wherefore if ye be dead with Christ from the rudiments of the world , why , as though living in the world , are ye subject to ordinances ,

text: ( Touch not ; taste not ; handle not ;
text2: ni teikais nih atsnarpjais nih kausjais

text: Which all are to perish with the using ; ) after the commandments and doctrines of men ?
text2: þatei ist all du riurein þairh þatei is brukjaidau bi anabusnim jah laiseinim manne

text: Which things have indeed a shew of wisdom in will worship , and humility , and neglecting of the body ; not in any honour to the satisfying of the flesh .
text2: þoei sind sweþauh waurd habandona handugeins in fastubnja jah hauneinai hairtins jah unfreideinai leikis ni in sweriþo ƕizai du soþa leikis

text: If ye then be risen with Christ , seek those things which are above , where Christ sitteth on the right hand of God .
text2: Jabai nu miþurrisuþ Xristau þoei iupa sind sokeiþ þarei Xristus ist in taihswai gudis sitands

text: Set your affection on things above , not on things on the earth .
text2: þaimei iupa sind fraþjaiþ ni þaim þoei ana airþai sind

text: For ye are dead , and your life is hid with Christ in God .
text2: unte gadauþnodeduþ jah libains izwara gafulgina ist miþ Xristau in guda

text: When Christ , who is our life , shall appear , then shall ye also appear with him in glory .
text2: þan Xristus swikunþs wairþiþ libains izwara þanuh jah jus bairhtai wairþiþ miþ imma in wulþau

text: Mortify therefore your members which are upon the earth ; fornication , uncleanness , inordinate affection , evil concupiscence , and covetousness , which is idolatry :

text: For which things ' sake the wrath of God cometh on the children of disobedience :

text: In the which ye also walked some time , when ye lived in them .
text2: in þaimei jah jus iddjeduþ simle þan libaideduþ in þaim

text: But now ye also put off all these ; anger , wrath , malice , blasphemy , filthy communication out of your mouth .
text2: iþ nu aflagjiþ jah jus þo alla hatis þwairhein unselein anaqiss aglaitiwaurdein us munþa izwaramma ni

text: Lie not one to another , seeing that ye have put off the old man with his deeds ;

text: And have put on the new man , which is renewed in knowledge after the image of him that created him :

text: Where there is neither Greek nor Jew , circumcision nor uncircumcision , Barbarian , Scythian , bond nor free : but Christ is all , and in all .

text: Put on therefore , as the elect of God , holy and beloved , bowels of mercies , kindness , humbleness of mind , meekness , longsuffering ;

column6: Put on therefore , as the elect of God , holy and beloved , bowels of mercies , kindness , humbleness of mind , meekness , longsuffering ;

text: Forbearing one another , and forgiving one another , if any man have a quarrel against any : even as Christ forgave you , so also do ye .
text2: þulandans izwis misso jah fragibandans silbans jabai ƕas wiþra ƕana habai fairina
column6: Forbearing one another , and forgiving one another , if any man have a quarrel against any : even as Christ forgave you , so also do ye .
column8: swaswe jah Xristus fragaf izwis swa jah jus taujaiþ

text: And above all these things put on charity , which is the bond of perfectness .
text2: aþþan ufar alla þo friaþwa sei ist gabindi ainamundiþos

text: And let the peace of God rule in your hearts , to the which also ye are called in one body ; and be ye thankful .
text2: jah gawairþi gudis swignjai in hairtam izwaraim in þammei jah laþodai wesuþ in ainamma leika jah awiliudondans wairþaiþ

text: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom ; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs , singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord .
text2: waurd Xristaus bauai in izwis gabigaba in allai handugein jah frodein ahmeinai laisjandans jah talzjandans izwis silbans psalmom hazeinim saggwim ahmeinaim in anstai siggwandans in hairtam izwaraim fraujin

text: And whatsoever ye do in word or deed , do all in the name of the Lord Jesus , giving thanks to God and the Father by him .
text2: all þisƕah þatei taujaiþ in waurda aiþþau in waurstwa all in namin fraujins Iesuis awiliudondans guda attin þairh ina

text: Wives , submit yourselves unto your own husbands , as it is fit in the Lord .
text2: jus qinons ufhausjaiþ wairam izwaraim swe gaqimiþ in fraujin

text: Husbands , love your wives , and be not bitter against them .
text2: wairos frijoþ qenins izwaros jah ni sijaiþ baitrai wiþra þos

text: Children , obey your parents in all things : for this is well pleasing unto the Lord .
text2: barna ufhausjaiþ fadreinam bi all unte þata waila galeikaiþ ist in fraujin

text: Fathers , provoke not your children to anger , lest they be discouraged .
text2: jus attans ni gramjaiþ barna izwara du þwairhein ei ni wairþaina in unlustau

text: Servants , obey in all things your masters according to the flesh ; not with eyeservice , as menpleasers ; but in singleness of heart , fearing God :

text: And whatsoever ye do , do it heartily , as to the Lord , and not unto men ;

text: Knowing that of the Lord ye shall receive the reward of the inheritance : for ye serve the Lord Christ .

column6: Knowing that of the Lord ye shall receive the reward of the inheritance : for ye serve the Lord Christ .
column8: unte fraujin Xristau skalkinoþ

text: But he that doeth wrong shall receive for the wrong which he hath done : and there is no respect of persons .
text2: sa auk skaþaila andnimiþ þatei skoþ jah nist wiljahalþein at guda

text: Masters , give unto your servants that which is just and equal ; knowing that ye also have a Master in heaven .
text2: Jus fraujans garaiht jah ibnassu þewisam atkunnaiþ witandans þatei aihuþ jah jus fraujan in himinam

text: Continue in prayer , and watch in the same with thanksgiving ;
text2: bidai haftjandans izwis wakandans in izai in awiliudam

text: Withal praying also for us , that God would open unto us a door of utterance , to speak the mystery of Christ , for which I am also in bonds :

text: That I may make it manifest , as I ought to speak .

text: Walk in wisdom toward them that are without , redeeming the time .
text2: in handugein gaggaiþ du þaim uta mel usbugjandans

text: Let your speech be alway with grace , seasoned with salt , that ye may know how ye ought to answer every man .
text2: waurd izwar sinteino in anstai salta gasupoþ sijai ei witeiþ ƕaiwa skuleiþ ainƕarjammeh andhafjan

text: All my state shall Tychicus declare unto you , who is a beloved brother , and a faithful minister and fellowservant in the Lord :
text2: þatei bi mik ist all gakanneiþ izwis Twkeikus sa liuba broþar jah triggwa andbahts jah gaskalki in fraujin

text: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose , that he might know your estate , and comfort your hearts ;

text: With Onesimus , a faithful and beloved brother , who is one of you . They shall make known unto you all things which are done here .

text: The salutation by the hand of me Paul . Remember my bonds . Grace be with you . Amen .
text2: goleins meinai handau Pawlaus

text: Ye are witnesses , and God also , how holily and justly and unblameably we behaved ourselves among you that believe :
text2: jah guþ ƕaiwa weihaba jah garaihtaba jah unfairinodaba izwis þaim galaubjandam wesum

text: As ye know how we exhorted and comforted and charged every one of you , as a father doth his children ,
text2: swaswe wituþ ainƕarjanoh izwara swe atta barna seina bidjandans izwis jah gaþlaihandans
column6: As ye know how we exhorted and comforted and charged every one of you , as a father doth his children ,

text: As ye know how we exhorted and comforted and charged every one of you , as a father doth his children ,
text2: swaswe wituþ ainƕarjanoh izwara swe atta barna seina bidjandans izwis jah gaþlaihandans
column6: As ye know how we exhorted and comforted and charged every one of you , as a father doth his children ,

text: That ye would walk worthy of God , who hath called you unto his kingdom and glory .
text2: jah weitwodjandans du gaggan izwis wairþaba gudis saei laþoda izwis du seinai þiudangardjai jah wulþau

text: For this cause also thank we God without ceasing , because , when ye received the word of God which ye heard of us , ye received it not as the word of men , but as it is in truth , the word of God , which effectually worketh also in you that believe .
text2: duþe jah weis awiliudom guda unsweibandans unte nimandans at uns waurd hauseinais gudis andnemuþ ni swaswe waurd manne ak swaswe ist sunjaba waurd gudis þatei jah waurkeiþ in izwis juzei galaubeiþ

text: For ye , brethren , became followers of the churches of God which in Judaea are in Christ Jesus : for ye also have suffered like things of your own countrymen , even as they have of the Jews :
text2: jus auk galeikondans waurþuþ broþrjus aikklesjom gudis þaim wisandeim in Iudaia in Xristau Iesu unte þata samo wunnuþ jah jus fram izwaraim inkunjam swaswe jah weis fram Iudaium
column6: For ye , brethren , became followers of the churches of God which in Judaea are in Christ Jesus : for ye also have suffered like things of your own countrymen , even as they have of the Jews :

text: For ye , brethren , became followers of the churches of God which in Judaea are in Christ Jesus : for ye also have suffered like things of your own countrymen , even as they have of the Jews :
text2: jus auk galeikondans waurþuþ broþrjus aikklesjom gudis þaim wisandeim in Iudaia in Xristau Iesu unte þata samo wunnuþ jah jus fram izwaraim inkunjam swaswe jah weis fram Iudaium
column6: For ye , brethren , became followers of the churches of God which in Judaea are in Christ Jesus : for ye also have suffered like things of your own countrymen , even as they have of the Jews :

text: Who both killed the Lord Jesus , and their own prophets , and have persecuted us ; and they please not God , and are contrary to all men :
text2: þaiei jah fraujin usqemun Iesua jah swesaim praufetum jah uns frawrekun jah guda ni galeikandans jah allaim mannam andaneiþans sind

text: Forbidding us to speak to the Gentiles that they might be saved , to fill up their sins alway : for the wrath is come upon them to the uttermost .
text2: warjandans uns du þiudom rodjan ei ganisaina akei du usfulljan seinos frawaurhtins sinteino
column6: Forbidding us to speak to the Gentiles that they might be saved , to fill up their sins alway : for the wrath is come upon them to the uttermost .
column8: aþþan snauh ana ins hatis gudis und andi

text: Forbidding us to speak to the Gentiles that they might be saved , to fill up their sins alway : for the wrath is come upon them to the uttermost .
text2: warjandans uns du þiudom rodjan ei ganisaina akei du usfulljan seinos frawaurhtins sinteino
column6: Forbidding us to speak to the Gentiles that they might be saved , to fill up their sins alway : for the wrath is come upon them to the uttermost .
column8: aþþan snauh ana ins hatis gudis und andi

text: But we , brethren , being taken from you for a short time in presence , not in heart , endeavoured the more abundantly to see your face with great desire .
text2: aþþan weis broþrjus gaainaidai af izwis du mela ƕeilos andwairþja ni hairtin ufarassau sniumidedum andaugi izwar gasaiƕan in managamma lustau

text: Wherefore we would have come unto you , even I Paul , once and again ; but Satan hindered us .
text2: unte wildedum qiman at izwis ik raihtis Pawlus jah ainamma sinþa jah twaim jah analatida uns Satana

text: For what is our hope , or joy , or crown of rejoicing ? Are not even ye in the presence of our Lord Jesus Christ at his coming ?
text2: ƕa auk ist unsara wens aiþþau faheþs aiþþau waips ƕoftuljos niu jus in andwairþja fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus in is quma

text: For ye are our glory and joy .
text2: jus auk siuþ wulþus unsar jah faheþs

text: Wherefore when we could no longer forbear , we thought it good to be left at Athens alone ;
text2: In þizei ju ni usþulandans þanamais galeikaida uns ei biliþanai weseima in Aþeinim ainai

text: And sent Timotheus , our brother , and minister of God , and our fellowlabourer in the gospel of Christ , to establish you , and to comfort you concerning your faith :
text2: jah insandidedum Teimauþaiu broþar unsarana jah andbaht gudis in aiwaggeljon Xristaus ei izwis gatulgjai jah bidjai bi galaubein izwara

text: That no man should be moved by these afflictions : for yourselves know that we are appointed thereunto .
text2: ei ni ainshun afagjaidau in þaim aggwiþom silbans auk wituþ þatei du þamma satidai sijum

text: For verily , when we were with you , we told you before that we should suffer tribulation ; even as it came to pass , and ye know .
text2: jah auk þan wesum at izwis fauraqeþum izwis þatei anawairþ was uns du winnan agliþos swaswe jah warþ jah wituþ

text: For this cause , when I could no longer forbear , I sent to know your faith , lest by some means the tempter have tempted you , and our labour be in vain .
text2: duþþe jah ik ju ni usþulands insandida du ufkunnan galaubein izwara ibai aufto usfaifraisi izwis sa fraisands jah sware wairþai arbaiþs unsara

text: But now when Timotheus came from you unto us , and brought us good tidings of your faith and charity , and that ye have good remembrance of us always , desiring greatly to see us , as we also to see you :
text2: aþþan nu at qimandin Teimauþaiu at unsis fram izwis jah gateihandin uns galaubein jah friaþwa izwara jah þatei gaminþi unsar habaiþ god sinteino gairnjandans uns gasaiƕan swaswe jah weis izwis
column6: But now when Timotheus came from you unto us , and brought us good tidings of your faith and charity , and that ye have good remembrance of us always , desiring greatly to see us , as we also to see you :

text: But now when Timotheus came from you unto us , and brought us good tidings of your faith and charity , and that ye have good remembrance of us always , desiring greatly to see us , as we also to see you :
text2: aþþan nu at qimandin Teimauþaiu at unsis fram izwis jah gateihandin uns galaubein jah friaþwa izwara jah þatei gaminþi unsar habaiþ god sinteino gairnjandans uns gasaiƕan swaswe jah weis izwis
column6: But now when Timotheus came from you unto us , and brought us good tidings of your faith and charity , and that ye have good remembrance of us always , desiring greatly to see us , as we also to see you :

text: Therefore , brethren , we were comforted over you in all our affliction and distress by your faith :
text2: in uh þis gaþrafstidai sijum broþrjus fram izwis ana allai nauþai jah aglon unsarai in izwaraizos galaubeinais

text: For now we live , if ye stand fast in the Lord .
text2: unte sai libam jabai jus gastandiþ in fraujin

text: For what thanks can we render to God again for you , for all the joy wherewith we joy for your sakes before our God ;
text2: ƕa auk awiliude magum usgildan guda bi izwis ana allai fahedai þizaiei faginom in izwara faura guda unsaramma

text: Night and day praying exceedingly that we might see your face , and might perfect that which is lacking in your faith ?
text2: naht jah daga ufarassau bidjandans ei gasaiƕaima andwairþja izwara jah ustiuhaima waninassu galaubeinais izwaraizos

text: Now God himself and our Father , and our Lord Jesus Christ , direct our way unto you .
text2: aþþan silba guþ jah atta unsar jah frauja unsar Iesus Xristus garaihtjai wig unsarana du izwis

text: And the Lord make you to increase and abound in love one toward another , and toward all men , even as we do toward you :
text2: aþþan izwis frauja managjai jah ganohnan gataujai friaþwai in izwis misso jah allans swaswe jah weis in izwis
column6: And the Lord make you to increase and abound in love one toward another , and toward all men , even as we do toward you :

text: And the Lord make you to increase and abound in love one toward another , and toward all men , even as we do toward you :
text2: aþþan izwis frauja managjai jah ganohnan gataujai friaþwai in izwis misso jah allans swaswe jah weis in izwis
column6: And the Lord make you to increase and abound in love one toward another , and toward all men , even as we do toward you :

text: To the end he may stablish your hearts unblameable in holiness before God , even our Father , at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ with all his saints .
text2: du tulgjan hairtona izwara unfairinona in weihiþai faura guda jah attin unsaramma in quma fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus miþ allaim þaim weiham seinaim

text: Furthermore then we beseech you , brethren , and exhort you by the Lord Jesus , that as ye have received of us how ye ought to walk and to please God , so ye would abound more and more .
text2: þannu nu broþrjus anahaitam bidai izwis jah bidjam in fraujin Iesua ei swaswe andnemuþ at uns ƕaiwa skuluþ gaggan jah galeikan guda swa jah gaggaiþ jah gaaukaiþ mais

text: For ye know what commandments we gave you by the Lord Jesus .
text2: wituþ auk ƕarjos anabusnins atgebum izwis þairh fraujan Iesu Xristu

text: For this is the will of God , even your sanctification , that ye should abstain from fornication :
text2: þata auk ist wilja gudis weihiþa izwara ei gahabaiþ izwis af kalkinassau

text: That every one of you should know how to possess his vessel in sanctification and honour ;
text2: ei witi ƕarjizuh izwara gastaldan sein kas in weihiþai jah sweriþai
column6: That every one of you should know how to possess his vessel in sanctification and honour ;

text: That every one of you should know how to possess his vessel in sanctification and honour ;
text2: ei witi ƕarjizuh izwara gastaldan sein kas in weihiþai jah sweriþai
column6: That every one of you should know how to possess his vessel in sanctification and honour ;

text: Not in the lust of concupiscence , even as the Gentiles which know not God :
text2: ni in gairunja lustaus swaswe jah þiudos þozei ni kunnun guþ

text: That no man go beyond and defraud his brother in any matter : because that the Lord is the avenger of all such , as we also have forewarned you and testified .
text2: ei ƕas ni ufargaggai nih bi faihu _ol_ broþar seinana unte fraweitands frauja ist allaize swaswe jah fauraqeþum izwis jah weitwodidedum

text: For God hath not called us unto uncleanness , but unto holiness .
text2: unte ni laþoda uns guþ du unhrainiþai ak in weihiþa

text: He therefore that despiseth , despiseth not man , but God , who hath also given unto us his holy Spirit .
text2: in uh þis nu saei ufbrikiþ ni mann ufbrikiþ ak guda saei gaf ahman seinana weihana izwis

text: But as touching brotherly love ye need not that I write unto you : for ye yourselves are taught of God to love one another .
text2: aþþan bi broþrulubon ni þaurbum meljan izwis unte silbans jus at guda uslaisidai sijuþ du frijon izwis misso

text: And indeed ye do it toward all the brethren which are in all Macedonia : but we beseech you , brethren , that ye increase more and more ;
text2: jah auk taujiþ þata in allans broþruns in allai Makidonai aþþan bidjam izwis broþrjus biauknan mais

text: And that ye study to be quiet , and to do your own business , and to work with your own hands , as we commanded you ;
text2: jah biarbaidjan anaqal jah taujan swesa jah waurkjan handum izwaraim swaswe jah izwis anabudum

text: That ye may walk honestly toward them that are without , and that ye may have lack of nothing .
text2: ei gaggaiþ gafehaba du þaim þaiei uta sind jah ni ainishun ƕis þaurbeiþ

text: But I would not have you to be ignorant , brethren , concerning them which are asleep , that ye sorrow not , even as others which have no hope .
text2: aþþan ni wileima izwis unweisans broþrjus bi þans anaslepandans ei ni saurgaiþ swe þai anþarai þaiei ni haband wen

text: For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again , even so them also which sleep in Jesus will God bring with him .
text2: unte jabai galaubjam þatei Iesus gaswalt jah usstoþ swa jah guþ þans þaiei anasaislepun þairh Iesu tiuhiþ miþ imma

text: For this we say unto you by the word of the Lord , that we which are alive and remain unto the coming of the Lord shall not prevent them which are asleep .
text2: þat uþ þan izwis qiþam in waurda fraujins þatei weis þai libandans þai bilaibidans in quma fraujins ni bisniwam faur þans anaslepandans

text: For the Lord himself shall descend from heaven with a shout , with the voice of the archangel , and with the trump of God : and the dead in Christ shall rise first :
text2: unte silba frauja in haitjai in stibnai arkaggilaus jah in þuthaurna gudis dalaþ atsteigiþ af himina jah dauþans þai in Xristau usstandand faurþis

text: Then we which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds , to meet the Lord in the air : and so shall we ever be with the Lord .
text2: þaþro þan weis þai libandans þai aflifnandans suns miþ imma frawilwanda in milhmam du gamotjan fraujin in luftau jah swa framwigis miþ fraujin wairþam

text: Wherefore comfort one another with these words .
text2: swaei nu þrafsteiþ izwis misso in þaim waurdam

text: But of the times and the seasons , brethren , ye have no need that I write unto you .
text2: Aþþan bi þo þeihsa jah mela broþrjus ni þaurbum ei izwis meljaima

text: For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night .
text2: unte silbans glaggwo wituþ þatei dags fraujins swe þiubs in naht swa qimiþ

text: For when they shall say , Peace and safety ; then sudden destruction cometh upon them , as travail upon a woman with child ; and they shall not escape .
text2: þan qiþand gawairþi jah tulgiþa þanuh unweniggo ins biqimiþ fralusts swaswe sair qiþuhafton jah ni unþaþliuhand

text: But ye , brethren , are not in darkness , that that day should overtake you as a thief .
text2: aþþan jus broþrjus ni sijuþ in riqiza ei sa dags izwis swe þiubs gafahai

text: Ye are all the children of light , and the children of the day : we are not of the night , nor of darkness .
text2: unte allai jus sunjus liuhadis sijuþ jah sunjus dagis ni siuþ nahts ni riqizis

text: Therefore let us not sleep , as do others ; but let us watch and be sober .
text2: þannu nu ni slepaima swe þai anþarai ak wakaima jah warai sijaima

text: For they that sleep sleep in the night ; and they that be drunken are drunken in the night .
text2: unte þaiei slepand naht slepand jah þaiei drugkanai wairþand nahts drugkanai wairþand

text: But let us , who are of the day , be sober , putting on the breastplate of faith and love ; and for an helmet , the hope of salvation .
text2: iþ weis dagis wisandans usskawai sijaima gahamodai brunjon galaubeinais jah friaþwos jah hilma wenai naseinais

text: For God hath not appointed us to wrath , but to obtain salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: unte ni satida uns guþ in hatis ak du gafreideinai ganistais þairh fraujan unsarana Iesu Xristu

text: Who died for us , that , whether we wake or sleep , we should live together with him .
text2: saei gaswalt faur uns ei jaþþe slepaima jaþþe wakaima samana miþ imma libaima

text: Wherefore comfort yourselves together , and edify one another , even as also ye do .
text2: in uh þis þrafsteiþ izwis misso jah timrjaiþ ainƕarjizuh anþar anþarana swaswe jah taujiþ

text: And we beseech you , brethren , to know them which labour among you , and are over you in the Lord , and admonish you ;
text2: aþþan bidjam izwis broþrjus kunnan þans arbaidjandans in izwis jah faurstassjans izwarans in fraujin jah talzjandans izwis

text: And to esteem them very highly in love for their work ' s sake . And be at peace among yourselves .
text2: jah sweraiþ ins ufarassau in friaþwai in waurstwis ize jah gawairþi habaiþ in izwis

text: Now we exhort you , brethren , warn them that are unruly , comfort the feebleminded , support the weak , be patient toward all men .
text2: bidjam uþ þan izwis broþrjus talzjaiþ þans ungatassans þrafstjaiþ þans grindafraþjans usþulaiþ þans siukans usbeisneigai sijaiþ wiþra allans

text: See that none render evil for evil unto any man ; but ever follow that which is good , both among yourselves , and to all men .
text2: saiƕiþ ibai ƕas ubil und ubilamma ƕamma usgildai ak sinteino þiuþ laistjaiþ miþ izwis misso jah wiþra allans

text: Rejoice evermore .
text2: sinteino faginoþ in fraujin

text: Pray without ceasing .
text2: unsweibandans bidjaiþ

text: In every thing give thanks : for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you .
text2: in allamma awiliudoþ þata auk ist wilja gudis in Xristau Iesu in izwis

text: Quench not the Spirit .
text2: ahman ni afƕapjaiþ

text: Despise not prophesyings .
text2: praufetjam ni frakunneiþ

text: Prove all things ; hold fast that which is good .
text2: aþþan all uskiusaiþ þatei god sijai gahabaiþ

text: Abstain from all appearance of evil .
text2: ubilaizo afhabaiþ izwis

text: And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly ; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: aþþan silba guþ gawairþjis gaweihai izwis allandjo jah gahailana izwarana ahman jah saiwala jah leik unfairinona in quma fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus gafastaindau

text: Faithful is he that calleth you , who also will do it .
text2: triggws saei laþoda izwis saei jah taujiþ

text: Brethren , pray for us .
text2: broþrjus bidjaiþ uþ þan jah bi uns

text: Greet all the brethren with an holy kiss .
text2: goljaiþ broþruns allans in gafrijonai weihai

text: I charge you by the Lord that this epistle be read unto all the holy brethren .
text2: biswara izwis in fraujin ei ussiggwaidau so aipistaule allaim þaim weiham broþrum

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you . Amen .
text2: ansts fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus miþ izwis amen

text: Paul , and Silvanus , and Timotheus , unto the church of the Thessalonians in God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Pawlus jah Silbanus jah Teimauþaius aikklesjon Þaissalauneikaie in guda attin unsaramma jah fraujin Iesu Xristau

text: Grace unto you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: ansts izwis jah gawairþi fram guda attin unsaramma jah fraujin Iesu Xristau

text: We are bound to thank God always for you , brethren , as it is meet , because that your faith groweth exceedingly , and the charity of every one of you all toward each other aboundeth ;
text2: awiliudon skulum guda sinteino in izwara broþrjus swaswe wairþ ist unte ufarwahseiþ galaubeins izwara jah managniþ friaþwa ainƕarjizuh allaize izwara in izwis misso

text: So that we ourselves glory in you in the churches of God for your patience and faith in all your persecutions and tribulations that ye endure :
text2: swaei weis silbans in izwis ƕopam in aikklesjom gudis in stiwitjis izwaris jah galaubeinais in allaim wrakjom izwaraim jah aglom þozei usþulaiþ

text: Which is a manifest token of the righteous judgment of God , that ye may be counted worthy of the kingdom of God , for which ye also suffer :
text2: taikn garaihtaizos stauos gudis du wairþans briggan izwis þiudangardjos gudis in þizozei jah þulaiþ

text: Seeing it is a righteous thing with God to recompense tribulation to them that trouble you ;
text2: sweþauh jabai garaiht ist at guda usgildan þaim gaþreihandam izwis aggwiþa

text: And to you who are troubled rest with us , when the Lord Jesus shall be revealed from heaven with his mighty angels ,
text2: jah izwis gaþulandam iusila miþ uns in andhuleinai fraujins unsaris Iesuis af himinam miþ aggilum mahtais is
column6: And to you who are troubled rest with us , when the Lord Jesus shall be revealed from heaven with his mighty angels ,

text: And to you who are troubled rest with us , when the Lord Jesus shall be revealed from heaven with his mighty angels ,
text2: jah izwis gaþulandam iusila miþ uns in andhuleinai fraujins unsaris Iesuis af himinam miþ aggilum mahtais is
column6: And to you who are troubled rest with us , when the Lord Jesus shall be revealed from heaven with his mighty angels ,

text: In flaming fire taking vengeance on them that know not God , and that obey not the gospel of our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: in funins lauhmunjai gibandins fraweit ni kunnandam guþ jah ni ufhausjandam aiwaggeljon fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus

text: Who shall be punished with everlasting destruction from the presence of the Lord , and from the glory of his power ;
text2: þaiei fraweit usgiband fralust aiweinon fram andwairþja fraujins jah fram wulþau mahtais is

text: When he shall come to be glorified in his saints , and to be admired in all them that believe ( because our testimony among you was believed ) in that day .
text2: þan qimiþ ushauhnan in þaim weiham seinaim jah sildaleiknan in allaim þaim galaubjandam unte galaubida ist weitwodei unsara du izwis in daga jainamma

text: Wherefore also we pray always for you , that our God would count you worthy of this calling , and fulfil all the good pleasure of his goodness , and the work of faith with power :
text2: du þammei jah bidjam sinteino bi izwis ei izwis wairþans briggai þizos laþonais guþ unsar jah fulljai alla leikain þiuþeinais seinaizos jah waurstw galaubeinais in mahtai

text: That the name of our Lord Jesus Christ may be glorified in you , and ye in him , according to the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: ei ushauhnai namo fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus in izwis jah jus in imma bi anstai gudis unsaris jah fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus

text: Now we beseech you , brethren , by the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ , and by our gathering together unto him ,
text2: Aþþan bidjam izwis broþrjus in qumis fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus jah gaqumþais unsaraizos du imma

text: That ye be not soon shaken in mind , or be troubled , neither by spirit , nor by word , nor by letter as from us , as that the day of Christ is at hand .
text2: du ni sprauto wagjan izwis fram ahin nih drobnan nih þairh ahman nih þairh waurda nih þairh aipistaulein swe þairh uns swe þatei instandai dags Xristaus

text: Let no man deceive you by any means : for that day shall not come , except there come a falling away first , and that man of sin be revealed , the son of perdition ;
text2: ni ƕashun izwis usluto ƕamma haidau unte niba qimiþ afstass faurþis jah andhulids wairþai manna frawaurhtais sunus fralustais
column6: Let no man deceive you by any means : for that day shall not come , except there come a falling away first , and that man of sin be revealed , the son of perdition ;

text: Let no man deceive you by any means : for that day shall not come , except there come a falling away first , and that man of sin be revealed , the son of perdition ;
text2: ni ƕashun izwis usluto ƕamma haidau unte niba qimiþ afstass faurþis jah andhulids wairþai manna frawaurhtais sunus fralustais
column6: Let no man deceive you by any means : for that day shall not come , except there come a falling away first , and that man of sin be revealed , the son of perdition ;

text: Who opposeth and exalteth himself above all that is called God , or that is worshipped ; so that he as God sitteth in the temple of God , shewing himself that he is God .
text2: sa andstandands jah ufarhafjands sik ufar all qiþanana guþ aiþþau blotinassu swaei ina in alh gudis gasitan

text: Therefore , brethren , stand fast , and hold the traditions which ye have been taught , whether by word , or our epistle .
text2: unsaros

text: Now our Lord Jesus Christ himself , and God , even our Father , which hath loved us , and hath given us everlasting consolation and good hope through grace ,
text2: aþþan silba frauja unsar Iesus Xristus jah guþ jah atta unsar saei frijoda uns jah atgaf gaþlaiht aiweina jah wen goda in anstai

text: Comfort your hearts , and stablish you in every good word and work .
text2: gaþrafstjai hairtona izwara jah gatulgjai in allaim waurstwam jah waurdam godaim

text: Finally , brethren , pray for us , that the word of the Lord may have free course , and be glorified , even as it is with you :
text2: þata anþar gabidjaiþ jah bi unsis broþrjus ei waurd fraujins þragjai jah mikiljaidau swaswe jah at izwis

text: And that we may be delivered from unreasonable and wicked men : for all men have not faith .
text2: jah ei uslausjaindau af gastojanaim jah ubilaim mannam ni auk ist allaim galaubeins

text: But the Lord is faithful , who shall stablish you , and keep you from evil .
text2: aþþan triggws frauja saei gatulgeiþ izwis jah galausjai izwis af þamma ubilin

text: And we have confidence in the Lord touching you , that ye both do and will do the things which we command you .
text2: aþþan gatrauam in fraujin in izwis ei þatei anabudum izwis jah taujiþ jah taujan habaiþ

text: And the Lord direct your hearts into the love of God , and into the patient waiting for Christ .
text2: ak frauja garaihtjai hairtona izwara in friaþwai gudis jah in usþulainai Xristaus

text: Now we command you , brethren , in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ , that ye withdraw yourselves from every brother that walketh disorderly , and not after the tradition which he received of us .
text2: aþþan anabiudam izwis broþrjus in namin fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus ei gaskaidaiþ izwis af allamma broþre ƕairbandane ungatassaba jah ni bi anafilham þoei andnemuþ at uns

text: For yourselves know how ye ought to follow us : for we behaved not ourselves disorderly among you ;
text2: ist galeikon unsis unte ni ungatewidai wesum in izwis

text: Neither did we eat any man ' s bread for nought ; but wrought with labour and travail night and day , that we might not be chargeable to any of you :
text2: nih arwjo hlaib matidedum at ƕamma ak winnandans in arbaidai naht jah daga waurkjandans ei ni kauridedeima ƕana izwara

text: Not because we have not power , but to make ourselves an ensample unto you to follow us .
text2: ni þatei ni habaidedeima waldufni ak ei uns silbans du frisahtai gebeima izwis du galeikon unsis

text: For even when we were with you , this we commanded you , that if any would not work , neither should he eat .
text2: jah auk þan wesum at izwis þata izwis anabudum ei jabai ƕas ni wili waurkjan nih matjai

text: For we hear that there are some which walk among you disorderly , working not at all , but are busybodies .
text2: hausjam auk sumans ƕairbandans in izwis ungatassaba ni waiht waurkjandans ak fairweitjandans

text: Now them that are such we command and exhort by our Lord Jesus Christ , that with quietness they work , and eat their own bread .
text2: þaim uh swaleikaim anabiudam jah bidjam in fraujin Iesua Xristau ei miþ rimisa waurkjandans seinana hlaif matjaina

text: But ye , brethren , be not weary in well doing .
text2: aþþan jus broþrjus ni wairþaiþ usgrudjans waila taujandans

text: And if any man obey not our word by this epistle , note that man , and have no company with him , that he may be ashamed .
text2: iþ jabai ƕas ni ufhausjai waurda unsaramma þairh þos bokos þana gatarhjaiþ ni blandaiþ izwis miþ imma ei gaskamai sik

text: Yet count him not as an enemy , but admonish him as a brother .
text2: jan ni swaswe fijand ina rahnjaiþ ak talzjaiþ swe broþar

text: Now the Lord of peace himself give you peace always by all means . The Lord be with you all .
text2: aþþan silba frauja gawairþeis gibai izwis gawairþi sinteino in allaim stadim frauja miþ allaim izwis

text: The salutation of Paul with mine own hand , which is the token in every epistle : so I write .
text2: so goleins meinai handau Pawlaus þatei ist bandwo ana allaim aipistaulem meinaim swa melja

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: ansts fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus miþ allaim izwis amen

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the commandment of God our Saviour , and Lord Jesus Christ , which is our hope ;
text2: Pawlus apaustaulus Xristaus Iesuis bi anabusnim gudis nasjandis unsaris jah Xristaus Iesuis wenais unsaraizos

text: Unto Timothy , my own son in the faith : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God our Father and Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Teimauþaiau walisin barna in galaubeinai ansts armaio gawairþi fram guda attin jah Xristau Iesu fraujin unsaramma

text: As I besought thee to abide still at Ephesus , when I went into Macedonia , that thou mightest charge some that they teach no other doctrine ,
text2: swaswe baþ þuk saljan in Aifaison galeiþands Makedonais ei faurbiudais sumaim ei anþarleiko ni laisjaina

text: Neither give heed to fables and endless genealogies , which minister questions , rather than godly edifying which is in faith : so do .
text2: niþ þan atsaiƕaina spille jah gabaurþiwaurde andalausaize þoei soknim andstaldand mais þau timreinai gudis þizai wisandein in galaubeinai

text: Now the end of the commandment is charity out of a pure heart , and of a good conscience , and of faith unfeigned :
text2: aþþan andeis ist anabusnais friaþwa us hrainjamma hairtin jah miþwissein godai jah galaubeinai unhindarweisai

text: From which some having swerved have turned aside unto vain jangling ;
text2: af þaimei sumai afairzidai uswandidedun du lausawaurdein

text: Desiring to be teachers of the law ; understanding neither what they say , nor whereof they affirm .
text2: wiljandans wisan witodalaisarjos nih fraþjandans nih ƕa rodjand nih bi ƕa stiurjand

text: But we know that the law is good , if a man use it lawfully ;
text2: aþþan witum þatei goþ ist witoþ jabai ƕas is witoda brukeiþ

text: Knowing this , that the law is not made for a righteous man , but for the lawless and disobedient , for the ungodly and for sinners , for unholy and profane , for murderers of fathers and murderers of mothers , for manslayers ,
text2: witands þatei garaihtamma nist witoþ satiþ ak witodalausaim jah untalaim jah unsibjaim jah frawaurhtaim jah unairknaim jah usweihaim attans bliggwandam jah aiþeins
column6: Knowing this , that the law is not made for a righteous man , but for the lawless and disobedient , for the ungodly and for sinners , for unholy and profane , for murderers of fathers and murderers of mothers , for manslayers ,

text: Knowing this , that the law is not made for a righteous man , but for the lawless and disobedient , for the ungodly and for sinners , for unholy and profane , for murderers of fathers and murderers of mothers , for manslayers ,
text2: witands þatei garaihtamma nist witoþ satiþ ak witodalausaim jah untalaim jah unsibjaim jah frawaurhtaim jah unairknaim jah usweihaim attans bliggwandam jah aiþeins
column6: Knowing this , that the law is not made for a righteous man , but for the lawless and disobedient , for the ungodly and for sinners , for unholy and profane , for murderers of fathers and murderers of mothers , for manslayers ,

text: For whoremongers , for them that defile themselves with mankind , for menstealers , for liars , for perjured persons , and if there be any other thing that is contrary to sound doctrine ;
text2: horam mannans gaþiwandam liugnjam ufarswaram jah jabai ƕa aljis þizai hailon laiseinai andstandiþ

text: According to the glorious gospel of the blessed God , which was committed to my trust .
text2: sei ist bi aiwaggeli wulþaus þis audagins gudis þatei gatrauaiþ ist mis

text: And I thank Christ Jesus our Lord , who hath enabled me , for that he counted me faithful , putting me into the ministry ;
text2: jah awiliudo þamma inswinþjandin mik Xristau Iesu fraujin unsaramma unte triggwana mik rahnida gasatjands in andbahtja

text: Who was before a blasphemer , and a persecutor , and injurious : but I obtained mercy , because I did it ignorantly in unbelief .
text2: ikei faura was wajamerjands jah wraks jah ufbrikands akei gaarmaiþs was unte unwitands gatawida in ungalaubeinai

text: And the grace of our Lord was exceeding abundant with faith and love which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: iþ ufarassiþ warþ ansts fraujins miþ galaubeinai jah friaþwai þizai in Xristau Iesu

text: This is a faithful saying , and worthy of all acceptation , that Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners ; of whom I am chief .
text2: triggw þata waurd jah allaizos andanumtais wairþ þatei Xristus Iesus qam in þamma fairƕau frawaurhtans nasjan þizeei frumists im ik

text: Howbeit for this cause I obtained mercy , that in me first Jesus Christ might shew forth all longsuffering , for a pattern to them which should hereafter believe on him to life everlasting .
text2: akei duþþe gaarmaiþs warþ ei in mis frumistamma ataugidedi Xristaus Iesus alla usbeisnein du frisahtai þaim ize anawairþai wesun du galaubjan imma du libainai aiweinon

text: Now unto the King eternal , immortal , invisible , the only wise God , be honour and glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: aþþan þiudana aiwe unriurjamma ungasaiƕanamma ainamma frodamma guda sweriþa jah wulþus in aldins aiwe amen

text: This charge I commit unto thee , son Timothy , according to the prophecies which went before on thee , that thou by them mightest war a good warfare ;
text2: faura faursniwandam ana þuk praufetjam ei driugais in þaim þata godo drauhtiwitoþ

text: Holding faith , and a good conscience ; which some having put away concerning faith have made shipwreck :
text2: habands galaubein jah goda miþwissein þizaiei sumai afskiubandans bi galaubein naqadai waurþun

text: Of whom is Hymenaeus and Alexander ; whom I have delivered unto Satan , that they may learn not to blaspheme .
text2: þizeei ist Hwmainaius jah Alaiksandrus þanzei anafalh Satanin ei gatalzjaindau ni wajamerjan

text: I exhort therefore , that , first of all , supplications , prayers , intercessions , and giving of thanks , be made for all men ;
text2: Bidja nu frumist allis taujan bidos aihtronins liteinins awiliuda fram allaim mannam

text: For kings , and for all that are in authority ; that we may lead a quiet and peaceable life in all godliness and honesty .
text2: fram þiudanam jah fram allaim þaim in ufarassau wisandam ei slawandein jas sutja ald bauaima in allai gagudein jag gariudja

text: For this is good and acceptable in the sight of God our Saviour ;
text2: þat uþ þan ist god jah andanem in andwairþja nasjandis unsaris gudis

text: Who will have all men to be saved , and to come unto the knowledge of the truth .
text2: saei allans mans wili ganisan jah in ufkunþja sunjos qiman

text: For there is one God , and one mediator between God and men , the man Christ Jesus ;
text2: ains allis guþ ains jah midumonds gudis jah manne manna Xristus Iesus
column6: For there is one God , and one mediator between God and men , the man Christ Jesus ;

text: For there is one God , and one mediator between God and men , the man Christ Jesus ;
text2: ains allis guþ ains jah midumonds gudis jah manne manna Xristus Iesus
column6: For there is one God , and one mediator between God and men , the man Christ Jesus ;

text: Who gave himself a ransom for all , to be testified in due time .
text2: sa gibands sik silban andabauht faur allans þizei weitwodein melam swesaim

text: Whereunto I am ordained a preacher , and an apostle , ( I speak the truth in Christ , and lie not ; ) a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and verity .
text2: du þammei gasatiþs im ik merjands jah apaustaulus sunja qiþa in Xristau ni liuga laisareis þiudo in galaubeinai jas sunjai

text: I will therefore that men pray every where , lifting up holy hands , without wrath and doubting .
text2: wiljau nu wairans bidjan in allaim stadim ushafjandans swiknos handuns inuh þwairhein jah tweiflein

text: In like manner also , that women adorn themselves in modest apparel , with shamefacedness and sobriety ; not with broided hair , or gold , or pearls , or costly array ;
text2: samaleiko jah qinons in gafeteinai hrainjai miþ gariud_n jah inahein fetjandeins sik ni in flahtom aiþþau gulþa aiþþau marikreitum aiþþau wastjom galaubaim

text: But ( which becometh women professing godliness ) with good works .
text2: ak þatei gadob ist qinom gahaitandeim guþ blotan þairh waurstwa goda

text: Let the woman learn in silence with all subjection .
text2: qino in hauniþai galaisjai sik in allai ufhauseinai

text: But I suffer not a woman to teach , nor to usurp authority over the man , but to be in silence .
text2: iþ galaisjan qinon ni uslaubja nih fraujinon faura waira ak wisan in þahainai

text: For Adam was first formed , then Eve .
text2: Adam auk fruma gadigans warþ þaþroh Aiwwa

text: And Adam was not deceived , but the woman being deceived was in the transgression .
text2: jah Adam ni warþ uslutoþs iþ qino uslutoda in missadedai warþ

text: Notwithstanding she shall be saved in childbearing , if they continue in faith and charity and holiness with sobriety .
text2: iþ ganisiþ þairh barne gabaurþ jabai gastandand in galaubeinai jah frijaþwai jah weihiþai miþ gafraþjein

text: This is a true saying , If a man desire the office of a bishop , he desireth a good work .
text2: Triggw þata waurd jabai ƕas aipiskaupeins gairneiþ godis waurstwis gairneiþ

text: A bishop then must be blameless , the husband of one wife , vigilant , sober , of good behaviour , given to hospitality , apt to teach ;
text2: skal nu aipiskaupus ungafairinonds wisan ainaizos qenais aba andaþahts froþs gafaurs gastigods laiseigs
column6: A bishop then must be blameless , the husband of one wife , vigilant , sober , of good behaviour , given to hospitality , apt to teach ;

text: A bishop then must be blameless , the husband of one wife , vigilant , sober , of good behaviour , given to hospitality , apt to teach ;
text2: skal nu aipiskaupus ungafairinonds wisan ainaizos qenais aba andaþahts froþs gafaurs gastigods laiseigs
column6: A bishop then must be blameless , the husband of one wife , vigilant , sober , of good behaviour , given to hospitality , apt to teach ;

text: Not given to wine , no striker , not greedy of filthy lucre ; but patient , not a brawler , not covetous ;
text2: ni weinnas nis slahuls ak sutis ni sakuls ni faihufriks

text: One that ruleth well his own house , having his children in subjection with all gravity ;
text2: seinamma garda waila fauragaggands barna habands ufhausjandona miþ allai anawiljein

text: ( For if a man know not how to rule his own house , how shall he take care of the church of God ? )
text2: iþ jabai ƕas seinamma garda fauragaggan ni mag ƕaiwa aikklesjon gudis gakaroþ

text: Not a novice , lest being lifted up with pride he fall into the condemnation of the devil .
text2: nih niujasatidana ibai aufto ufarhauhiþs in stauai atdriusai unhulþins

text: Moreover he must have a good report of them which are without ; lest he fall into reproach and the snare of the devil .
text2: skal auk is weitwodiþa goda haban fram þaim uta ei ni atdriusai in idweit jah hlamma unhulþins

text: Likewise must the deacons be grave , not doubletongued , not given to much wine , not greedy of filthy lucre ;
text2: jah swa diakaununs gariudans nih faihufrikans ni weina filu haftjandans nih aglaitgastaldans

text: Holding the mystery of the faith in a pure conscience .
text2: habandans runa galaubeinais in hrainjai gahugdai

text: And let these also first be proved ; then let them use the office of a deacon , being found blameless .
text2: jaþ þai þan gakiusaindau frumist jas swa andbahtjaina ungafairinodai wisandans

text: Even so must their wives be grave , not slanderers , sober , faithful in all things .
text2: qinons samaleiko gariudos ni diabulos gafaurjos triggwos in allamma

text: Let the deacons be the husbands of one wife , ruling their children and their own houses well .
text2: diakaunjus sijaina ainaizos qenais abans barnam waila fauragaggandans jah seinaim gardim

text: For they that have used the office of a deacon well purchase to themselves a good degree , and great boldness in the faith which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: þai auk waila andbahtjandans grid goda sis fairwaurkjand jah managa balþein in galaubeinai þizai in Xristau Iesu

text: These things write I unto thee , hoping to come unto thee shortly :
text2: þata þus melja wenjands qiman at þus sprauto

text: But if I tarry long , that thou mayest know how thou oughtest to behave thyself in the house of God , which is the church of the living God , the pillar and ground of the truth .
text2: aþþan jabai sainjau ei witeis ƕaiwa skuld ist in garda gudis usmitan saei ist aikklesjo gudis libandins sauls jah tulgiþa sunjos

text: And without controversy great is the mystery of godliness : God was manifest in the flesh , justified in the Spirit , seen of angels , preached unto the Gentiles , believed on in the world , received up into glory .
text2: jah unsahtaba mikils ist gagudeins runa saei gabairhtiþs warþ in leika garaihts gadomiþs warþ in ahmin ataugids warþ þaim aggilum merids warþ in þiudom galaubiþs warþ in fairƕau andnumans warþ in wulþau

text: Now the Spirit speaketh expressly , that in the latter times some shall depart from the faith , giving heed to seducing spirits , and doctrines of devils ;
text2: Aþþan ahma swikunþaba qiþiþ þatei in spedistaim dagam afstandand sumai galaubeinai atsaiƕandans ahmane airziþos jah laiseino unhulþono

text: Speaking lies in hypocrisy ; having their conscience seared with a hot iron ;
text2: in liutein liugnawaurde jah gatandida habandane swesa miþwissein

text: Forbidding to marry , and commanding to abstain from meats , which God hath created to be received with thanksgiving of them which believe and know the truth .
text2: warjandane liugos gaþarban mate þanzei guþ gaskop du andniman miþ awiliudam galaubjandam jah ufkunnandam sunja

text: For every creature of God is good , and nothing to be refused , if it be received with thanksgiving :
text2: unte all gaskaftais gudis goþ jah ni waiht du uswaurpai miþ awiliudam andnuman

text: For it is sanctified by the word of God and prayer .
text2: gaweihada auk þairh waurd gudis jah bida

text: If thou put the brethren in remembrance of these things , thou shalt be a good minister of Jesus Christ , nourished up in the words of faith and of good doctrine , whereunto thou hast attained .
text2: þata insakands broþrum goþs wairþis andbahts Xristaus Iesuis alands waurdam galaubeinais jah godaizos laiseinais þoei galaistides

text: But refuse profane and old wives ' fables , and exercise thyself rather unto godliness .
text2: iþ þo usweihona swe usalþanaizo spilla biwandei iþ þroþei þuk silban du gagudein

text: For bodily exercise profiteth little : but godliness is profitable unto all things , having promise of the life that now is , and of that which is to come .
text2: aþþan leikeina usþroþeins du fawamma ist bruks iþ gagudei du allamma ist bruks gahaita habandei libainais þizos nu jah þizos anawairþons

text: This is a faithful saying and worthy of all acceptation .
text2: triggw þata waurd jah allaizos andanumtais wairþ

text: For therefore we both labour and suffer reproach , because we trust in the living God , who is the Saviour of all men , specially of those that believe .
text2: duþþe allis arbaidjam jah idweitjanda unte wenidedum du guda libandin saei ist nasjands allaize manne þishun galaubjandane

text: These things command and teach .
text2: anabiud þata jah laisei

text: Let no man despise thy youth ; but be thou an example of the believers , in word , in conversation , in charity , in spirit , in faith , in purity .
text2: ni manna þeinai jundai frakunni ak frisahts sijais þaim galaubjandam in waurda in usmeta in friaþwai in galaubeinai in swikniþai

text: Till I come , give attendance to reading , to exhortation , to doctrine .
text2: unte qima gaumei saggwa boko gaþlaihtai laiseinai

text: Neglect not the gift that is in thee , which was given thee by prophecy , with the laying on of the hands of the presbytery .
text2: ni sijais unkarja þizos in þus anstais sei gibana warþ þus þairh praufetjans afar analageinai handiwe praizbwtaireins

text: Meditate upon these things ; give thyself wholly to them ; that thy profiting may appear to all .
text2: þo sido þus in uþ þaim sijais ei þatei þeihais þu swikunþ sijai allaim

text: Take heed unto thyself , and unto the doctrine ; continue in them : for in doing this thou shalt both save thyself , and them that hear thee .
text2: atsaiƕ du þus silbin jah du laiseinai usdaudo þairhwis in þaim þatuh auk taujands jah þuk silban ganasjis jah hausjandans þus

text: Rebuke not an elder , but intreat him as a father ; and the younger men as brethren ;
text2: Seneigana ni andbeitais ak gaþlaih swe attin juggans swe broþruns
column6: Rebuke not an elder , but intreat him as a father ; and the younger men as brethren ;

text: Rebuke not an elder , but intreat him as a father ; and the younger men as brethren ;
text2: Seneigana ni andbeitais ak gaþlaih swe attin juggans swe broþruns
column6: Rebuke not an elder , but intreat him as a father ; and the younger men as brethren ;

text: The elder women as mothers ; the younger as sisters , with all purity .
text2: sineigos swe aiþeins juggos swe swistruns in allai swiknein

text: Honour widows that are widows indeed .
text2: widuwons swerai þozei bi sunjai sijaina widuwons

text: But if any widow have children or nephews , let them learn first to shew piety at home , and to requite their parents : for that is good and acceptable before God .
text2: galaisjaina sik faurþis swesana gard barusnjan jah andalauni usgiban fadreinam þata auk ist andanem in andwairþja gudis

text: Now she that is a widow indeed , and desolate , trusteth in God , and continueth in supplications and prayers night and day .
text2: aþþan soei bi sunjai widuwo ist jah ainakla wenida du guda jah þairhwisiþ in bidom nahtam jah dagam

text: But she that liveth in pleasure is dead while she liveth .
text2: iþ so wizondei in azetjam jah libandei dauþa ist

text: And these things give in charge , that they may be blameless .
text2: jah þata anabiud ei ungafairinodos sijaina

text: But if any provide not for his own , and specially for those of his own house , he hath denied the faith , and is worse than an infidel .
text2: aþþan jabai ƕas swesaim þishun ingardjam ni gaþlaihiþ galaubein inwidiþ jah ist ungalaubjandin wairsiza

text: Let not a widow be taken into the number under threescore years old , having been the wife of one man ,
text2: widuwo gawaljaidau ni mins saihs tigum jere sei wesi ainis abins qens
